description: This chocolate protein shake is creamy, filling, and quickly made in a blender with banana, protein powder, peanut butter, cocoa powder, and honey.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice cubes, milk, banana, protein powder, peanut butter, honey, and cocoa powder together in a blender until smooth.

title: Fruit and Yogurt Smoothie
description: This yogurt smoothie recipe blends strawberries, banana, pineapple juice, orange juice, and plain yogurt together for a delicious, refreshing drink.
instructions: Combine strawberries, banana, yogurt, pineapple juice, sugar, orange juice, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
description: This oatmeal smoothie has a deep pink color and a rich, creamy texture. It's fast, filling, and delicious — perfect for a quick on-the-go breakfast!
instructions: Blend soy milk, oats, strawberries, and banana in a blender until smooth. Add sugar and vanilla and blend again until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Basic Fruit Smoothie
description: A tasty fruit smoothie recipe with strawberries, banana, peaches, fruit juice, and ice. Feel free to experiment with your favorite fruits!
ingredients: 2 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced
instructions: Gather all ingredients.
Combine strawberries, peaches, and banana in a blender; blend until smooth.
Add ice and pour in juice; blend again to desired consistency.

title: B and L's Strawberry Smoothie
description: This strawberry smoothie recipe blends fresh strawberries, milk, yogurt, sugar, and vanilla for a tasty, icy treat. Great for breakfast, or anytime.
instructions: Combine strawberries, milk, yogurt, sugar, and vanilla in a blender. Add ice and blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

title: How to Make a Cafe Latte
description: Learn how to make a cafe latte for a warm, delicious mug of steamy milk and bold espresso right at home. This is a great recipe for all coffee lovers.
ingredients: 1.3300000429153 cups hot freshly brewed dark roast espresso coffee
instructions: Heat milk in a saucepan set over medium-low heat. Whisk briskly with a wire whisk to create foam.
Brew espresso and pour into four cups. Pour in milk, holding back the foam with a spoon. Spoon foam over the top.

title: Pineapple and Banana Smoothie
description: This pineapple smoothie with banana is quick, tropical, fruity goodness with just four ingredients. Easily blend together and your smoothie is served.
ingredients: 0.25 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and cubed
instructions: Place ice cubes, pineapple, banana, and pineapple juice into the container of a blender. Puree on high until smooth.

title: Mimosa
description: A mimosa is a Champagne cocktail flavored with fresh orange juice. It's a perfect drink for Mother's Day, Christmas, or any special occasion brunch!
instructions: Divide orange juice evenly into two flute glasses; top with chilled Champagne and serve.

title: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: This iced caramel macchiato is made with cold brew coffee and milk, vanilla syrup, and a drizzle of caramel sauce for a sweet and creamy summer drink.
ingredients: 4 ounces Gevalia® Cold Brew Concentrate - House Blend
instructions: Pour vanilla syrup into a drinking glass. Add ice cubes, then pour in milk.
Slowly pour in cold brew concentrate. Drizzle with caramel sauce.

title: Old-Fashioned Swedish Glögg
description: Glögg is a fragrant Swedish spiced wine punch spiked with whiskey and rum. You'll feel the heat when you serve this mulled wine for the holidays!
instructions: Heat port wine in a large stockpot with a lid over medium heat until just below the simmering point. Add bourbon and rum; heat until just below simmering. Save the bottles and their caps for storing leftover glögg.
Meanwhile, place cinnamon stick, orange peel, cloves, and cardamom pods in the center of the cheesecloth square. Gather edges of the cheesecloth and tie with kitchen twine to secure; set aside.

When wine mixture is very hot but not boiling, carefully light it with a long-handled match. Wearing a heatproof cooking mitt, carefully pour sugar into the flames; let mixture burn for 1 minute. Place the lid on the stockpot to extinguish the flames and turn off the heat. Let mixture cool, covered, about 10 minutes.
Add the cheesecloth spice bundle, raisins, and almonds to warm wine mixture; let it cool to room temperature, about 1 hour.
Strain cooled glögg and reserve the raisins and almonds.

To serve: Pour glögg into a saucepan and warm over medium-low heat until hot but not simmering, about 5 minutes. Ladle 3 ounces of warmed glögg into a small coffee cup or a small Swedish-style glögg mug, and garnish each serving with a few reserved raisins and almonds.

title: Lola's Horchata
description: This horchata recipe is an easy way to make a refreshing Mexican drink with rice, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon that's great served with spicy foods.
instructions: Pour water and rice into a blender; mix until rice begins to break up, about 1 minute. Let rice and water stand at room temperature for at least 3 hours.
Strain rice water into a pitcher and discard rice. Stir in sugar, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Chill thoroughly before serving over ice.

title: Strawberry Banana Protein Smoothie
description: This balanced strawberry banana protein smoothie is easy to make with banana, strawberries, almonds, and protein powder; great for after a workout.
instructions: Place strawberries, banana, almonds, and water into a blender; blend to combine. Add ice cubes and puree until smooth. Add protein powder and mix until evenly incorporated, about 30 seconds.

title: Pineapple Cleanser Smoothie
description: This vibrant cucumber and pineapple smoothie with celery, ginger, parsley, lemon, and coconut water is a very refreshing way to start the day!
ingredients: 1 cup coconut water, or to taste
instructions: Blend coconut water, pineapple, celery, cucumber, lemon, parsley, and ginger together in a blender until smooth.

title: Spinach and Kale Smoothie
description: This vibrant spinach and kale smoothie gives you an extra boost of energy thanks to the addition of peanut butter, banana, and chia seeds.
instructions: Combine spinach, almond milk, kale, peanut butter, and chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth. Add banana and blend until smooth.

title: Healthy Chocolate Smoothie
description: This chocolate smoothie uses bananas, peanut butter, milk, vanilla, and cocoa for a healthy, kid-friendly beverage perfect for breakfast or a snack.
instructions: Combine bananas, milk, ice cubes, cocoa powder, peanut butter, and vanilla in a blender; blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses.

title: Kale and Banana Smoothie
description: This kale smoothie with banana is perfect to help get your daily fruits and veggies. Nutrient-rich kale is mixed in with this tasty, easy smoothie.
instructions: Place kale, banana, soy milk, flax seeds, and maple syrup into a blender. Cover and purée until smooth. Serve over ice.

title: Banana, Avocado, and Spinach Smoothie
description: This banana, avocado, and spinach smoothie recipe makes a quick and easy breakfast or snack that is perfect for a healthy, delicious meal on-the-go.
instructions: Blend banana, avocado, spinach, milk, ice cubes, honey, and vanilla together in a blender until smooth.

title: The Best Post-Workout Shake
description: This is the best post-workout protein shake. Made with almond milk, banana, whey protein powder, frozen berries, and peanut butter, it's a delicious treat.
instructions: Layer protein powder, flax meal, cocoa powder, and brown sugar in a blender. Add almond milk, frozen berries, banana, and peanut butter. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Kiwi Strawberry Smoothie
description: This kiwi strawberry smoothie is easy to make with pineapple and orange juice, vanilla frozen yogurt, and banana for a tropical, fruity quencher.
ingredients: 0.75 cup pineapple and orange juice blend
instructions: Place juice blend, frozen yogurt, banana, strawberries, and kiwi into a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into 2 glasses.

title: Vanilla Latte
description: Enjoy this vanilla latte without waiting in the drive-through line! Use your home espresso machine and steaming wand to get coffee shop results, at home.
instructions: Pour milk into a steaming pitcher and heat to 145 to 165 degrees F (65 to 70 degrees C) using the steaming wand of an espresso machine.
Pour espresso over vanilla syrup in a large coffee mug. Pour steamed milk over espresso, using a spoon to hold back the foam. Spoon foam over top.

title: Eggnog Latte
description: It wouldn't be Christmas without one (or several!). If you have a home espresso machine, this is a great holiday coffee treat.
instructions: Pour milk and eggnog into a steaming pitcher and heat to between 145 degrees F to 165 degrees F (65 to 70 degrees C) using the steaming wand. Brew the shot of espresso, then add to mug. Pour the steamed milk and eggnog into the mug, using a spoon to hold back the foam. Spoon foam over the top. Sprinkle nutmeg on top of the foam.

title: Matcha Frappe
description: This recipe, inspired by Starbucks Green Tea Frappuccino®, blends matcha green tea powder, milk, vanilla syrup, and ice for a delicious cold drink.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon matcha green tea powder, or more to taste
1 tablespoon whipped cream, or to taste
instructions: Combine milk, matcha green tea powder, ice, and vanilla syrup, respectively in a blender; blend to desired consistency. Serve with whipped cream on top.

title: Pumpkin Spice Coffee
description: Give your cuppa joe a nice, warm spicy taste with allspice and cinnamon. Just add the spices to coffee in your drip machine.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons half-and-half cream, or to taste
1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Mix the ground coffee, allspice, and cinnamon in a small bowl, and place into the filter of a drip coffee maker. Pour 4 cups of water into the coffee maker, and turn on the machine. When coffee has finished dripping, pour into 2 cups. Stir in cream and sugar to taste.

title: Orange Banana Smoothie
description: A delightful blend of orange and banana - filling enough to have as a breakfast!
instructions: In a blender, combine milk, oranges, banana, sugar, salt and yogurt. Blend for about 1 minute. Insert ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Strawberry Banana Protein Shake
description: This strawberry banana protein powder shake is made with skim milk and natural peanut butter for a great post-workout meal or on-the-go breakfast.
instructions: Layer milk, protein powder, ice, strawberries, banana, and peanut butter in a blender in this order; blend until creamy and smooth.

title: Filipino Avocado Milkshake
description: This avocado milkshake made with milk, sugar, vanilla ice cream, and a whole avocado is a rich and creamy treat and an interesting use of this green fruit!
ingredients: 1 medium avocado - peeled, pitted, and cubed
1 teaspoon fresh lemon or lime juice
instructions: Combine avocado, milk, ice cream, ice, sugar, and lemon juice in a blender. Purée until smooth.

title: Strawberry-Banana-Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: This creamy treat has protein and no added sugar for a yummy breakfast or dessert!
instructions: Place yogurt, peanut butter, banana, strawberries, and ice cubes into a blender. Puree until smooth.

title: Strawberry Raspberry Smoothie
description: This strawberry and raspberry smoothie recipe is easy and filling. Fruit is blended with yogurt, creating a probiotic-enhanced breakfast treat.
instructions: Blend strawberries, raspberries, milk, yogurt, honey, and vanilla together in a blender until smooth.

title: Healthy Cocoa, Banana, PB Smoothie
description: This cocoa, banana, and peanut butter smoothie is loaded with protein to keep you going on the morning or post-workout.
ingredients: 0.5 chopped frozen banana, or more to taste
instructions: Blend milk, banana, peanut butter, cocoa powder, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: POG Juice
description: POG juice is an acronym for passion fruit juice, orange juice, and guava nectar combined into an amazingly refreshing tropical drink! Serve well chilled.
ingredients: 6 cups passion fruit juice (such as Welch's®)
instructions: Combine passion fruit juice, guava nectar, and orange juice in a large glass pitcher and stir well. Chill until ready to serve.

title: Simple Summer Smoothie
description: Banana, strawberries, blueberries, and cherries with a touch of honey are my favorite ingredients for this smoothie.
instructions: Place the banana, strawberries, blueberries, cherries, and ice cubes into a blender. Pour in the orange juice, vanilla yogurt, and honey. Puree until smooth.

title: Spicy Bloody Mary Mix
description: With a nod to the famous 'bull shot' cocktail, this tasty bloody mary mix adds beef consomme for savory flavor. Drink it as is over ice or add vodka. Adjust the spices to your taste -- this version is spicy!
ingredients: 0.5 (10.5 ounce) can condensed beef consomme (such as Campbell's ®)
1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
instructions: Mix the tomato juice, beef consomme, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, hot pepper sauce, celery salt, and black pepper together in a pitcher; chill.

title: Apple Banana Smoothie
description: Thick and healthy fruit drink with apple, banana and orange juice. The frozen banana takes the place of shaved ice and results in a smooth, creamy texture. Serve with dollop of whipped cream for added effect.
ingredients: 1 Gala apple, peeled, cored and chopped
instructions: In a blender combine frozen banana, orange juice, apple and milk. Blend until smooth. pour into glasses and serve.

title: Peanut Butter Strawberry Smoothie
description: This simple smoothie pairs strawberries and peanut butter with yogurt and milk.
instructions: Blend strawberries, yogurt, milk, peanut butter, and brown sugar together in a blender for 2 minutes; let rest for 10 seconds. Blend until smooth, another 2 minutes.

title: Flax Seed Smoothie
description: This flaxseed smoothie combines frozen strawberries, banana, soy milk, and flaxseed meal to create a dairy-free smoothie that's perfect for on-the-go.
ingredients: 0.5 frozen banana, peeled and cut into chunks
instructions: Place soy milk, strawberries, banana, and flaxseed meal into a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Famous No Coffee Pumpkin Latte
description: You won't miss the coffee in this creamy and satisfying pumpkin and spice latte. For a special treat, top with whipped cream and a pinch of nutmeg.
instructions: Combine pumpkin, milk, sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla in a large saucepan over medium heat. Use a whisk to blend well. Heat to a simmer; do not boil.

title: Carrot and Orange Juice
description: This quick, fresh, and delicious juice is loaded with carrots and oranges, and is a great way to start off your day!
ingredients: 2 pounds organic carrots, trimmed and scrubbed
instructions: Press carrots and oranges through a juicer and into a large glass.

title: Green Monster Smoothie
description: Banana, spinach, and peanut butter blend with yogurt and milk for a power-packed smoothie.
instructions: Blend milk, yogurt, banana, peanut butter, spinach, and ice cubes until smooth.

title: Lela's Protein Mango Smoothie
description: Whip up this high-protein vanilla mango smoothie when you need a quick-and-easy refreshing treat.
ingredients: 0.5 mango, chopped, or more to taste
instructions: Blend mango, yogurt, almond milk, ice, protein powder, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Orange Creamsicle® Protein Shake
description: Blend a whole orange with Greek yogurt, protein powder, and soy milk into this healthier shake version of a Creamsicle® you can enjoy for breakfast.
instructions: Combine orange segments, zest, soy milk, yogurt, protein powder, ice, and vanilla extract in a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Healthy Blueberry Breakfast Smoothie
description: Wondering what to eat for your on-the-go breakfast? Make this healthy and delicious blueberry breakfast smoothie.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste
instructions: Blend blueberries, yogurt, orange juice, sugar, vanilla extract, and cinnamon together in a blender on low speed for 30 seconds; increase speed to high and blend until smooth, about 2 minutes. Add ice and blend on high until smooth, about 1 minute more.

title: White Chocolate Mocha
description: This is a white chocolate version of a classic mocha. No reason to head to the cafe--stay in and use your home espresso machine to brew up this delicious espresso drink.
instructions: Pour milk into a steaming pitcher and heat to 145 degrees F to 165 degrees F (65 to 70 degrees C) using the steaming wand. Measure the white chocolate syrup into a large coffee mug. Brew espresso, then add to mug. Pour the steamed milk into the mug, using a spoon to hold back the foam. Top with whipped cream and serve.

title: Carrot and Apple Juice
description: Fresh carrot and apple juice with a hint of ginger is a refreshing and colorful way to start the day.
instructions: Run carrots, apples, and celery through a juicer (alternating carrot, apple, and celery) according to manufacturer's instructions. Add ginger to juicer and process.

title: Mocha
description: This is a chocolate and coffee-lover's favorite! Using a home espresso machine, mix espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk--then top with whipped cream.
instructions: Pour milk into a steaming pitcher and heat to 145 degrees F to 165 degrees F (65 to 70 degrees C) using the steaming wand. Measure the chocolate syrup into a large coffee mug. Brew espresso, then add to mug. Pour the steamed milk into the mug, using a spoon to hold back the foam. Top with whipped cream.

title: Nectarine Sunshine Smoothie
description: Enjoy the brief, sweet season of fresh nectarines with this delicious smoothie.
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into pieces and frozen
instructions: Place the nectarines, frozen banana chunks, orange, vanilla yogurt, orange juice, and honey into a blender, and blend until smooth.

title: Banana Smoothie I
description: A smooth drink that is a meal in itself. Banana, milk and a nice raw egg - all topped off with a pinch of cinnamon. This recipe contains raw eggs. We recommend that pregnant women, young children, the elderly and the infirm do not consume raw eggs.
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, milk, vanilla, egg and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and top with a pinch of cinnamon.

title: Easy Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: Make your own pumpkin-spice latte-style treat from brewed coffee with this recipe.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons white sugar, or to taste
1 tablespoon whipped cream topping, or to taste
instructions: Mix half-and-half, sugar, and pumpkin pie spice together in a coffee mug. Pour coffee into mug; stir to blend.
Heat in microwave until hot, about 15 seconds. Top with whipped cream.

title: Flavored Latte
description: Use this basic recipe to make your favorite flavored latte with a home espresso machine.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons any flavor of flavored syrup
instructions: Pour milk into a steaming pitcher and heat to 145 degrees F to 165 degrees F (65 to 70 degrees C) using the steaming wand. Measure the flavored syrup into a large coffee mug. Brew espresso, then add to mug. Pour the steamed milk into the mug, using a spoon to hold back the foam. Spoon foam over the top.

title: Homemade Tomato Juice Cocktail
description: Homemade tomato juice cocktail is ready with just 5 ingredients and is a fraction of the cost of store-purchased versions.
instructions: Blend 2 cups water, tomato paste, lemon juice, sugar, and salt together in a blender until smooth; pour into a 1/2 gallon container. Stir 3 cups water into mixture. Refrigerate until thickened, about 1 hour. Add 1 more cup water if juice is too thick.

title: Bananerberry Smoothie
description: Strawberries, bananas, peaches, and apples blended with vanilla ice cream for a delightful fruit smoothie.
instructions: In a blender combine strawberries, banana, peaches, apples, and ice cream. Blend until smooth. Add ice, pour in milk and blend again until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Mango Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
description: Blend mango, oats, yogurt, orange juice, and banana together to make this recipe for a delicious breakfast smoothie.
instructions: Blend orange juice, mango, banana, yogurt, and oats together in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawberry Lassi
description: First popular in Punjab, India, and originally sometimes flavored with ground cumin, today's version of lassi is a sweet, frothy blend of yogurt, milk, and fruit served well chilled.
instructions: Cut 3 strawberries into small pieces and set aside. In a blender, place the remaining strawberries and sugar; blend on high speed for 30 seconds. Pour in the milk and blend another 30 seconds. Add the yogurt and blend on high speed for 1 minute.
To serve, place 1 ice cube in each of 3 glasses and pour in the lassi. Top with the strawberry pieces and serve.

title: Breakfast Banana Green Smoothie
description: Spinach, banana, and carrot provide a wealth of nutrients to this smoothie recipe for a quick breakfast option when adjusting to your back-to-school schedule!
ingredients: 2 cups baby spinach leaves, or to taste
1 carrot, peeled and cut into large chunks
0.75 cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt, or to taste
instructions: Put spinach, banana, carrot, yogurt, ice, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth.

Place 1/2 tablespoon chamoy in the bottom of the glass. Add 1/2 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning and 1/2 of the blended mangoes. Repeat layers and top with diced fresh mango.

title: Tropical Mango-Pineapple-Berry Smoothie
description: A refreshing tropical mango blueberry smoothie with strawberries and pineapple juice, made creamy with vanilla yogurt. Full of flavor and antioxidants!
instructions: Combine mango, frozen strawberries, yogurt, pineapple juice, and frozen blueberries in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Very Berry Anti-Inflammatory Smoothie
description: This grape, cherry, strawberry and blueberry smoothie tastes amazing while packing in anti-inflammatory benefits!
instructions: Pour almond milk into a high-frequency blender (such as Vitamix®). Add cherries, strawberries, grapes, blueberries, and turmeric.
Secure lid, and turn onto variable speed 1. Increase speed to variable 10. Blend for 30 to 45 seconds.

title: Triple Threat Fruit Smoothie
description: A wonderful, delightful fruit smoothie...it will help you cool down after a hot day in the sun.
instructions: In a blender, blend the kiwi, banana, blueberries, strawberries, ice, orange juice, and yogurt until smooth.

title: Mongolian Strawberry Orange Juice Smoothie
description: An icy fruit blend of fresh strawberries, orange juice, and ice.
instructions: In a blender, combine strawberries, orange juice, ice cubes, and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: World's Easiest Refreshing Smoothie
description: Pineapple and strawberries combine in this recipe for the world's easiest and most refreshing smoothie.
instructions: Blend pineapple, reserved pineapple juice, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

title: Tropical Fruit Smoothie
description: This refreshingly delicious smoothie is a tropical blend of fresh mango, papaya, strawberries, orange juice, and ice.
instructions: Combine mango, papaya, strawberries, orange juice, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry and Blueberry Oatmeal Health Shake
description: This strawberry and blueberry protein smoothie made with Greek yogurt, milk, and oats is a quick and easy way to fuel up for the day.
ingredients: 0.25 cup vanilla and honey Greek yogurt (such as Chobani®)
instructions: Combine blueberries, milk, strawberries, sugar, oats, and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth. Add ice; blend until smooth.

title: Papaya Surprise Smoothie
description: Papaya's sunny flavor is a great addition to banana and strawberry, the traditional smoothie favorites.
instructions: In a blender, blend the papaya, banana, strawberries, milk, sugar, and ice cubes until smooth.

title: Chocolate Strawberry Banana Milkshake
description: A wonderful milkshake that can easily be adapted for low-sugar diets. My mother got me started on this 20 years ago. I rarely add sugar or sweetener, but I realize that some people enjoy a bit more sweetness. You can substitute orange juice for milk if you like.
instructions: In a blender combine milk, strawberries, banana, chocolate milk powder, vanilla, and sugar. Blend until smooth.

title: Chocolate Strawberry Smoothie
description: This strawberry, banana chocolate yogurt shake makes a wonderful treat for any occasion.
instructions: In a blender combine bananas, strawberries, chocolate syrup and yogurt. Blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Banana Breeze Smoothie
description: Pineapple adds a bit of tropical flavor to this classic strawberry banana smoothie made with Almond Breeze.
ingredients: 1 cup Almond Breeze Original or Unsweetened Original almondmilk
0.5 cup fresh or juice packed pineapple
instructions: Puree all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawberry-Lime-Cilantro Smoothie
description: This refreshing strawberry and cilantro smoothie is packed with vitamins and minerals with the addition of a savory herb. A frozen banana makes it creamy and sweet.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen strawberries, slightly thawed and chopped
0.25 cup chopped cilantro, leaves and stems, lightly packed
instructions: Combine strawberries, banana, almond milk, ice, cilantro, lime juice, and stevia powder in a blender. Process until smooth, adding more almond milk or water for a smoother consistency.

title: Cherry Berry Blast Smoothie
description: Dark sweet cherries, frozen strawberries, plain yogurt, and almond milk combine to make this creamy and refreshing berry blast smoothie.
instructions: Combine strawberries, yogurt, almond milk, and frozen cherries in a blender; add ice. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Asian Pear and Strawberry Smoothie
description: This light, delicate smoothie is perfect for those hot summer days. The Asian pear flavor really comes through.
instructions: Place the ice, Asian pear, strawberries, yogurt, milk, and sugar into a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Creamy Banana Strawberry Split Smoothie
description: Bananas, strawberries, almond milk, cinnamon, and vanilla come together in this creamy banana split-inspired smoothie.
instructions: Blend almond milk, banana, strawberries, ice cubes, protein powder, vanilla extract, honey, ground flax seeds, ground chia seeds, and cinnamon in a blender until smooth.

title: Purple Power Punch Smoothie (My Kids' Fave)
description: This kid-pleasing power smoothie made with strawberries, blueberries, blackberries, and raspberries is sure to become your go-to smoothie of choice.
ingredients: 0.5 cup nonfat vanilla yogurt (such as Dannon® Light and Fit®)
3 tablespoons turbinado sugar (such as Sugar in the Raw®)
instructions: Pulse yogurt, strawberries, water, powdered milk, banana, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries, and protein powder together in a blender until well-mixed. Add ice, sugar, and honey and blend until smooth.

title: Morning Energy Booster Smoothie
description: Prune juice, yogurt, berries, and flax seed are blended together creating an energy-boosting smoothie to start your day off right.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
1 cup frozen blueberries, or to taste
instructions: Pour prune juice into a blender. Layer Greek yogurt, spinach, blueberries, strawberries, peach, and flax seeds in the blender, in this order. Start blender on low speed and gradually increase speed until smoothie is well blended.

title: PBnJ "Workday" Smoothie
description: Peanut butter, strawberries, yogurt, and banana are blended together creating a pb and j smoothie perfect for on-the-go meals for weekdays.
instructions: Place strawberries, banana, water, and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth, gradually adding more water if a thinner smoothie is desired. Add peanut butter blend until smooth.

title: Skinny Vegan Green Smoothie
description: This skinny vegan green smoothie is the perfect start in the day with unsweetened almond milk, strawberries, banana, and 2 cups of fresh spinach!
instructions: Combine spinach, strawberries, banana, almond milk, and agave in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Summer Sweet Smoothies
description: Fresh fruit blends with cranberry juice for a quick and sweet summertime smoothie.
instructions: Process the cranberry juice, strawberries, blueberries, watermelon, banana, and figs in a blender until smooth and creamy. Enjoy immediately or keep cool in refrigerator.

title: Strawberry Sensation Smoothie
description: Strawberry and orange flavors will be sure to perk up your morning!
instructions: Blend the strawberries, orange pieces, apple juice, vanilla yogurt, and almonds together in a blender until smooth.

title: Healthy Strawberry Smoothie
description: This strawberry smoothie made with oats, yogurt, and banana is a great on-the-go meal made with a Nutribullet® or blender.
instructions: Blend almond milk, banana, strawberries, yogurt, oats, and almonds together in a NutriBullet® or blender until smooth.

title: Mango-Strawberry Smoothie with Yogurt
description: A quick and easy mango strawberry smoothie made with nonfat vanilla yogurt. Great for an after-workout snack or just to enjoy on a hot day!
instructions: Combine mango, strawberries, and apple juice in a blender. Place ice over the fruit and pour in yogurt. Blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into a glass.

title: Easy Paradise Smoothie
description: Pineapple, strawberries, coconut, and a hint of vanilla give this smoothie the refreshing taste of paradise.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can pineapple in juice, chilled
1 (15 ounce) can cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez®)
instructions: Blend pineapple, strawberries, cream of coconut, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.

title: Backyard Berry Bowl
description: A berry smoothie is topped with more berries, banana, and granola in this quick and easy smoothie bowl.
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
instructions: Blend ice, 1/2 cup strawberries, 1 banana, blackberries, and apple juice together in a blender until smooth, adding more ice depending on your desired consistency. Pour smoothie into a bowl.
Top smoothie with remaining strawberries, remaining banana, blueberries, and granola. Drizzle honey over the top.

title: Watermelon Strawberry Mango Lemonade Smoothie
description: Watermelon, strawberries, and mango are blended a good amount of lemon juice creating a sweet and tasty on-the-go lemonade smoothie.
instructions: Blend watermelon, water, strawberries, mango, sugar, and lemon juice in a blender until smooth, about 5 minutes.

title: Strawberry Peach Smoothie from Yoplait®
description: A creamy, peach and orange smoothie is layered on top of a strawberry smoothie--pretty as a picture and oh so delicious.
ingredients: 1 (5.3 ounce) container Yoplait® Greek 100 Vanilla Yogurt, divided
instructions: Combine the strawberries, half the banana, 1/2 container of yogurt, milk and honey (if using) in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses and rinse out the blender.
Combine the remaining half the banana, remaining yogurt, peaches and orange juice in the blender and blend until smooth. Pour over the strawberry smoothie layer and serve.

title: Ginger Berry Smoothie
description: This invigorating smoothie made with strawberries, blueberries, and agave gets and extra kick from fresh ginger.
ingredients: 1 cup water, or more as needed
4 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped
instructions: Blend water, blueberries, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and smooth.

title: Chocolate-Covered Strawberry Smoothie
description: Ovaltine® is the secret ingredient in this chocolate-covered strawberry smoothie that is perfect for breakfast or as an anytime snack!
ingredients: 6 tablespoons powdered chocolate-flavored malt drink mix (such as Ovaltine®)
instructions: Blend milk, strawberries, yogurt, chocolate-flavored malt drink mix, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawberry-Pineapple Smoothie II
description: Delicious and refreshing smoothie full of flavor!
instructions: Pour the apple juice and pineapple into a blender; add the yogurt, pineapple chunks, and frozen strawberries and blend until smooth.

title: Ultimate Fruit Smoothie
description: Milk, orange juice, strawberries, mango, peach, and pineapple combine to make this delightful smoothie that has a little tang with dash of sweet.
ingredients: 0.5 mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
0.5 fresh peach - peeled, pitted, and sliced
instructions: Blend milk, orange juice, mango, peach, pineapple, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

title: Chocolate, Strawberry, and Banana Smoothie
description: Chia seeds, flax seed, chocolate soy milk, and plain yogurt are the base for this smoothie with bananas and strawberries.
instructions: Blend soy milk, yogurt, bananas, strawberries, flax seed, and chia seeds in a blender until smooth.

title: Gordon's Berry Breakfast Drink
description: This berry drink recipe makes an easy and satisfying breakfast-on-the-go and is equally wonderful served as a part of a sit down breakfast or brunch. Blend frozen blueberries and strawberries with juice, yogurt, and bananas to make this colorful and tasty drink.
instructions: Place the orange juice, pineapple juice, yogurt, blueberries, strawberries, and bananas into a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. The berry drink will be very thick. Serve immediately.

title: Nobody's Strawberry Watermelon Shakedown
description: Frozen strawberries and watermelon take a spin in the blender with cream, yogurt, and orange juice for a sensational summer smoothie! Serve with a slice of fresh watermelon, or a dollop of whipped cream!
instructions: Blend the strawberries, watermelon, cream, yogurt, orange juice, sugar, and vanilla in a blender until smooth.

title: Banana Banana Strawberry Smoothie
description: Banana extract provides this smoothie with a double dose of fruit flavor!
instructions: Place banana, banana extract, milk, yogurt, and sugar into a blender. Blend until smooth and serve.

title: California Smoothie
description: Strawberries are frozen, then blended with lemon yogurt and orange juice.
instructions: Place strawberries in a plastic container and freeze for about an hour.
In a blender, combine frozen strawberries, yogurt and orange juice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and serve.

title: Strawberry Peach Smoothie
description: Fresh peaches and strawberries perk up an ice-cold smoothie made with vanilla ice cream and soy milk. It's great on a hot day.
instructions: Pour soy milk into a blender and add vanilla ice cream, frozen strawberries, fresh strawberries, and peach slices. Blend until smooth and pour into a large glass.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
description: This peanut butter banana smoothie requires just 4 ingredients and a blender to prepare and enjoy for a sweet on-the-go breakfast or snack.
instructions: Gather all ingredients.
Place bananas, milk, peanut butter, honey, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Chocolate Banana Peanut Butter Protein Shake
description: This chocolate protein shake is creamy, filling, and quickly made in a blender with banana, protein powder, peanut butter, cocoa powder, and honey.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice cubes, milk, banana, protein powder, peanut butter, honey, and cocoa powder together in a blender until smooth.

title: Fruit and Yogurt Smoothie
description: This yogurt smoothie recipe blends strawberries, banana, pineapple juice, orange juice, and plain yogurt together for a delicious, refreshing drink.
instructions: Combine strawberries, banana, yogurt, pineapple juice, sugar, orange juice, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
description: This oatmeal smoothie has a deep pink color and a rich, creamy texture. It's fast, filling, and delicious — perfect for a quick on-the-go breakfast!
instructions: Blend soy milk, oats, strawberries, and banana in a blender until smooth. Add sugar and vanilla and blend again until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Spinach and Banana Power Smoothie
description: This vegan banana spinach smoothie provides a dairy-free and protein-rich pick-me-up that tastes delicious. It's easy to blend and take anywhere.
instructions: Blend soy milk and spinach together in a blender until smooth. Add banana and pulse until thoroughly blended.

title: Basic Fruit Smoothie
description: A tasty fruit smoothie recipe with strawberries, banana, peaches, fruit juice, and ice. Feel free to experiment with your favorite fruits!
ingredients: 2 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced
instructions: Gather all ingredients.
Combine strawberries, peaches, and banana in a blender; blend until smooth.
Add ice and pour in juice; blend again to desired consistency.

title: Pineapple and Banana Smoothie
description: This pineapple smoothie with banana is quick, tropical, fruity goodness with just four ingredients. Easily blend together and your smoothie is served.
ingredients: 0.25 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and cubed
instructions: Place ice cubes, pineapple, banana, and pineapple juice into the container of a blender. Puree on high until smooth.

title: Easy Mango Banana Smoothie
description: This fresh mango banana smoothie made with milk and vanilla yogurt makes a quick, easy, and deliciously creamy breakfast or mid-afternoon snack.
instructions: Combine mangos, banana, vanilla yogurt, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Strawberry Banana Protein Smoothie
description: This balanced strawberry banana protein smoothie is easy to make with banana, strawberries, almonds, and protein powder; great for after a workout.
instructions: Place strawberries, banana, almonds, and water into a blender; blend to combine. Add ice cubes and puree until smooth. Add protein powder and mix until evenly incorporated, about 30 seconds.

title: Strawberry Orange Banana Smoothie
description: This orange juice smoothie with strawberries and banana is a delicious source of antioxidants, fiber, potassium, and vitamin C, ready in 5 minutes.
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
instructions: Blend strawberries, orange juice, banana, and ice in a blender until smooth and frothy.

title: Healthy Chocolate Smoothie
description: This chocolate smoothie uses bananas, peanut butter, milk, vanilla, and cocoa for a healthy, kid-friendly beverage perfect for breakfast or a snack.
instructions: Combine bananas, milk, ice cubes, cocoa powder, peanut butter, and vanilla in a blender; blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses.

title: Kale and Banana Smoothie
description: This kale smoothie with banana is perfect to help get your daily fruits and veggies. Nutrient-rich kale is mixed in with this tasty, easy smoothie.
instructions: Place kale, banana, soy milk, flax seeds, and maple syrup into a blender. Cover and purée until smooth. Serve over ice.

title: Banana, Avocado, and Spinach Smoothie
description: This banana, avocado, and spinach smoothie recipe makes a quick and easy breakfast or snack that is perfect for a healthy, delicious meal on-the-go.
instructions: Blend banana, avocado, spinach, milk, ice cubes, honey, and vanilla together in a blender until smooth.

title: The Best Post-Workout Shake
description: This is the best post-workout protein shake. Made with almond milk, banana, whey protein powder, frozen berries, and peanut butter, it's a delicious treat.
instructions: Layer protein powder, flax meal, cocoa powder, and brown sugar in a blender. Add almond milk, frozen berries, banana, and peanut butter. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Kiwi Strawberry Smoothie
description: This kiwi strawberry smoothie is easy to make with pineapple and orange juice, vanilla frozen yogurt, and banana for a tropical, fruity quencher.
ingredients: 0.75 cup pineapple and orange juice blend
instructions: Place juice blend, frozen yogurt, banana, strawberries, and kiwi into a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into 2 glasses.

title: Orange Banana Smoothie
description: A delightful blend of orange and banana - filling enough to have as a breakfast!
instructions: In a blender, combine milk, oranges, banana, sugar, salt and yogurt. Blend for about 1 minute. Insert ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Strawberry Banana Protein Shake
description: This strawberry banana protein powder shake is made with skim milk and natural peanut butter for a great post-workout meal or on-the-go breakfast.
instructions: Layer milk, protein powder, ice, strawberries, banana, and peanut butter in a blender in this order; blend until creamy and smooth.

title: Blueberry, Banana, and Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: This is a perfect peanut butter and berry smoothie to start your day or enjoy as a snack. Flax gives a boost to this recipe. It's kid-friendly too!
instructions: Put flaxseed meal into a blender to grind and further break down.
Place banana, milk, blueberries, yogurt, peanut butter, and honey into the blender. Cover and purée until smooth.
Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Strawberry-Banana-Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: This creamy treat has protein and no added sugar for a yummy breakfast or dessert!
instructions: Place yogurt, peanut butter, banana, strawberries, and ice cubes into a blender. Puree until smooth.

title: Healthy Cocoa, Banana, PB Smoothie
description: This cocoa, banana, and peanut butter smoothie is loaded with protein to keep you going on the morning or post-workout.
ingredients: 0.5 chopped frozen banana, or more to taste
instructions: Blend milk, banana, peanut butter, cocoa powder, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Apple Banana Smoothie
description: Thick and healthy fruit drink with apple, banana and orange juice. The frozen banana takes the place of shaved ice and results in a smooth, creamy texture. Serve with dollop of whipped cream for added effect.
ingredients: 1 Gala apple, peeled, cored and chopped
instructions: In a blender combine frozen banana, orange juice, apple and milk. Blend until smooth. pour into glasses and serve.

title: Flax Seed Smoothie
description: This flaxseed smoothie combines frozen strawberries, banana, soy milk, and flaxseed meal to create a dairy-free smoothie that's perfect for on-the-go.
ingredients: 0.5 frozen banana, peeled and cut into chunks
instructions: Place soy milk, strawberries, banana, and flaxseed meal into a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Peach Banana Smoothie
description: Canned peaches, bananas, yogurt, and orange juice deliver a delicious smoothie in mere minutes.
ingredients: 0.25 cup white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Blend yogurt, peaches, bananas, orange juice, sugar, and ice in a blender on high until the ice is crushed and the smoothie is to your desired consistency.

title: Banana Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: This delicious banana peanut butter smoothie is made with powdered peanut butter, cocoa, and a touch of cinnamon.
instructions: Blend almond milk, banana, ice, peanut butter, cocoa powder, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth.

title: Green Monster Smoothie
description: Banana, spinach, and peanut butter blend with yogurt and milk for a power-packed smoothie.
instructions: Blend milk, yogurt, banana, peanut butter, spinach, and ice cubes until smooth.

title: All-Fruit Smoothies
description: There's nothing in this smoothie except pineapple juice, banana, and frozen strawberries and blueberries. It's smooth, frosty, and dairy-free.
instructions: Pour pineapple juice into a blender and add banana, strawberries, and blueberries. Cover and blend until smooth, about 1 minute. Pour into 2 glasses.

title: Nectarine Sunshine Smoothie
description: Enjoy the brief, sweet season of fresh nectarines with this delicious smoothie.
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into pieces and frozen
instructions: Place the nectarines, frozen banana chunks, orange, vanilla yogurt, orange juice, and honey into a blender, and blend until smooth.

title: Banana Smoothie I
description: A smooth drink that is a meal in itself. Banana, milk and a nice raw egg - all topped off with a pinch of cinnamon. This recipe contains raw eggs. We recommend that pregnant women, young children, the elderly and the infirm do not consume raw eggs.
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, milk, vanilla, egg and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and top with a pinch of cinnamon.

title: Banana Lassi
description: If you don't have any mango on hand, why not substitute in a banana to make a creamy banana lassi to go with your Indian food?
ingredients: 0.33333334326744 cup milk, or more to taste
instructions: Blend bananas, yogurt, milk, ice cubes, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.

title: Raspberry Blackberry Smoothie
description: A quick and delicious smoothie made with raspberries, blackberries, bananas and yogurt.
instructions: Place banana, blackberries, raspberries, yogurt, honey, and ice cubes into a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Bananerberry Smoothie
description: Strawberries, bananas, peaches, and apples blended with vanilla ice cream for a delightful fruit smoothie.
instructions: In a blender combine strawberries, banana, peaches, apples, and ice cream. Blend until smooth. Add ice, pour in milk and blend again until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Breakfast Banana Green Smoothie
description: Spinach, banana, and carrot provide a wealth of nutrients to this smoothie recipe for a quick breakfast option when adjusting to your back-to-school schedule!
ingredients: 2 cups baby spinach leaves, or to taste
1 carrot, peeled and cut into large chunks
0.75 cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt, or to taste
instructions: Put spinach, banana, carrot, yogurt, ice, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Cranberry Smoothie
description: Cranberries add a fresh and fall-like flavor to this easy, almond milk-based smoothie.
instructions: Blend almond milk, banana, mixed berries, and cranberries in a blender until smooth; refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.

title: Fresh Grapefruit Juice Smoothie
description: Whip up this tangy-sweet smoothie in minutes using freshly squeezed red grapefruit juice, strawberries, bananas, yogurt, and honey for a refreshing drink.
instructions: Place the grapefruit juice, strawberries, bananas, yogurt, honey, and ice into a blender. Cover, and blend until smooth.

title: Blueberry Smoothie Bowl
description: A blueberry and banana smoothie is topped with coconut and almonds in this quick and easy blueberry smoothie bowl recipe.
instructions: Blend blueberries, 1/2 banana, water, cashew butter, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl.
Top smoothie with sliced banana, almonds, and coconut.

title: Fig Smoothie
description: Sticky, sweet fresh figs are a delightful addition to the morning smoothie.
instructions: Place the bananas, figs, milk, and orange juice into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
description: A quick, cool, tasty treat, perfect for a hot summer day!
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, chocolate syrup, milk and crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
description: In addition to the fruit, this smoothie also has vanilla yogurt, wheat germ, and honey for the best strawberry banana smoothie recipe.
instructions: Combine yogurt, bananas, strawberries, wheat germ, and honey in a blender; blend until smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Strawberry Banana Nutella Smoothie
description: Enjoy strawberries, banana, and your favorite chocolate-hazelnut spread together in smoothie-form!
instructions: Blend milk, yogurt, banana, strawberries, and chocolate-hazelnut spread together in a blender until smooth.

title: Kiwi Banana Apple Smoothie
description: This kiwi, banana, apple smoothie is made hearty with chia seeds and maca powder added to the mix for a quick and easy, on-the-go breakfast.
instructions: Blend apple, banana, kiwifruit, milk, ice, chia seeds, and maca powder together in a blender until smooth.

title: Sweet Potato and Banana Smoothie
description: Sweet potato and banana are blended together with soy milk and cinnamon for a creamy and colorful sweet potato smoothie.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake sweet potato in the preheated oven until tender and cooked through, about 1 hour. Remove skin, then cool in the refrigerator 8 hours to overnight.
Blend sweet potato, banana, soy milk, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth.

title: Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie
description: Like a peanut butter and banana sandwich in liquid form. Makes a nice thick breakfast smoothie.
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, peanut butter and soy milk. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and drizzle with honey for garnish.

title: Milk Banana Smoothie
description: Milk, bananas, and a pinch of sweetener are all you need for this creamy, smooth drink.
ingredients: 5 (1 gram) packets low calorie granulated sugar substitute (such as Sweet 'n Low®)
instructions: Blend milk, bananas, and sugar substitute in a blender or food processor until smooth.

title: Strawberry-Yogurt Shake
description: Strawberries, bananas, yogurt and ice are all you need in your blender for this refreshing, ice-cold treat.
instructions: Blend strawberries, bananas, half of the ice cubes, and yogurt in a blender on high until smooth. Add the remaining ice and blend further until smooth again. Serve immediately.

title: Banana Avocado Yogurt Smoothie
description: This quick and easy banana avocado yogurt smoothie has no added sugar and is a guaranteed hit with the kids. Simply blend the ingredients together.
ingredients: 1 cup nonfat Greek yogurt (such as Chobani®)
instructions: Place yogurt, avocado, and banana in a blender and purée until smooth. Add water for a thinner smoothie.

title: PB Banana Oat Smoothie
description: This peanut butter, banana, and oat smoothie is flavored with cinnamon and honey for a deliciously creamy and filling on-the-go breakfast.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
instructions: Put banana, ice, oats, yogurt, skim milk, peanut butter, honey, and cinnamon, respectively, in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Vegan Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
description: This is a fast smoothie recipe using oats, creating a filling vegan strawberry and banana drink with a deep pink color and a creamy texture.
instructions: Blend almond milk, oats, strawberries, banana, agave nectar, and vanilla extract in a blender until smooth.

title: Refreshing Banana Drink
description: This banana drink is a refreshing beverage made with banana, almond milk, vanilla, and a touch of cinnamon that's ready in minutes.
instructions: Combine almond milk, banana, ice cubes, cinnamon, and vanilla in a blender; blend on medium speed until frothy and smooth, about 1 minute.

title: Vitamix Green Smoothie
description: Use a Vitamix blender to mix up this wholesome green smoothie that's so fruity and delicious, you won't taste the spinach!
ingredients: 15 seedless red grapes, or more to taste
instructions: Pour water into a Vitamix blender. Add grapes, banana, pear, orange, spinach, ground flax seeds, and ice, in that order. Blend until smooth and creamy.

title: Starter Smoothie
description: Customize this base recipe with your favorite fruits and vegetables for a tasty, calorie-conscious smoothie every time!
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into chunks and frozen
instructions: Blend blueberries, grape juice, banana, yogurt, ice, and honey in a blender until smooth, at least 3 minutes.

title: Green Power Mojito Smoothie
description: Spinach, pineapple, banana, and fresh mint leaves are blended to create this delicious, bright green smoothie with a taste similar to a mojito!
ingredients: 3 cups ice cubes, or as desired
2 cups baby spinach leaves, or to taste
10 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice, spinach, pineapple, water, banana, orange, mint, lemon juice, and lime juice in a blender until smooth.

title: Kale, Banana, and Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: Kale in smoothies is all the rage. Try this kale peanut butter smoothie made with peanut butter and bananas in vanilla-flavored almond milk.
ingredients: 0.5 bunch kale - stems removed and discarded, leaves torn into bite-size pieces
4 cubes ice, or more if desired
instructions: Blend bananas, almond milk, kale, ice, and peanut butter in a blender until smooth.

title: Kale Orange Banana Smoothie
description: A fresh orange, a pair of ripe bananas, and a kale leaf are blended into a pudding-like smoothie for a wholesome breakfast drink.
ingredients: 1 leaf kale, torn into several pieces
instructions: Blend orange in a blender until mostly juice.
Add water and kale; blend again on High speed until kale is liquefied.
Break bananas into chunks and add to the blender. Start blending at a lower speed until banana is incorporated. Increase speed to blend the mixture into a pudding-like texture.

title: Tropical Sunshine Smoothie
description: This tropical sunshine smoothie is loaded with banana, pineapple, and coconut water for a refreshing way to start the day.
ingredients: 1 sprig fresh chocolate mint, finely chopped
instructions: Blend banana, orange juice, mango, pineapple, coconut water, lime juice, and mint in a blender until smooth.

title: Dairy-Free Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie
description: This quick banana smoothie without milk uses cultured coconut milk, peanut butter, and honey to make a great breakfast or a cool afternoon snack.
instructions: Blend coconut milk, banana, peanut butter, and honey in a blender until smooth, about 1 minute. Add ice and blend again until ice is crushed, 2 to 3 minutes.

title: Banana Coconut Smoothie
description: Coconut cream blends with milk and banana in this Caribbean-inspired smoothie recipe.
instructions: Blend banana, milk, coconut cream, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.

title: Jumpstart Chocolate Workout Smoothie
description: Blend chocolate protein powder, almond milk, coffee, and banana together for a smoothie that will jump-start your day!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon unsalted natural peanut butter, or more to taste
instructions: Blend almond milk, ice cubes, banana, coffee, protein powder, honey, and peanut butter in a blender on low speed. Gradually turn speed up to high and blend until smooth, 20 to 30 seconds.

title: Mango Banana Smoothie
description: The orange mango smoothie from that famous coffee shop isn't available any longer, but you can make your own at home with this simple, 4-ingredient recipe.
instructions: Blend banana, mango, juice, and yogurt in a blender until nearly smooth.

title: Hot Banana Milkshake
description: An easy banana smoothie sweetened with honey and served hot makes a nice alternative to hot chocolate.
instructions: Mash bananas and brown sugar together in a bowl. Transfer to a small saucepan, place over medium heat and cook until bananas begin to brown, about 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Gradually mix 1 cup of milk into bananas and heat until mixture begins to steam. Stir honey and cinnamon into mixture until honey has dissolved.

Pour banana mixture into a blender no more than half full. Cover and hold the lid down; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend. Purée until smooth. Blend remaining 1/2 cup of milk into mixture until creamy.

title: Mango-Pineapple Smoothie
description: I invented this one day when I had leftover mango and pineapple juice. A spoonful of cream of coconut added the sweetness and special flavor with a tropical flare. You may use frozen pineapple juice ice cubes instead for more of a slush drink (about 8 pineapple ice cubes). Enjoy!
instructions: In a blender, blend the vanilla yogurt, pineapple juice, banana, mango, milk, and cream of coconut until smooth.

title: Heavenly Blueberry Smoothie
description: This blueberry, banana, and flax smoothie is to die for! It tastes so good, you forget that it's good for ya!
ingredients: 1 frozen banana, thawed for 10 to 15 minutes
instructions: Cut banana into small pieces and place into the bowl of a blender. Add the soy milk, yogurt, flax seed meal, and honey. Blend on lowest speed until smooth, about 5 seconds. Gradually add the blueberries while continuing to blend on low. Once the blueberries have been incorporated, increase speed, and blend to desired consistency.

title: Banana Chocolate Almond Milk Smoothie
description: Start your day with this filling chocolate almond milk smoothie made with dark chocolate and a full scoop of whey protein powder. It's a great afternoon snack too!
ingredients: 1.5 ounces dark chocolate bar (such as Hershey's® Special Dark), broken into pieces
instructions: Combine almond milk, banana, dark chocolate, and protein powder in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Triple Threat Fruit Smoothie
description: A wonderful, delightful fruit smoothie...it will help you cool down after a hot day in the sun.
instructions: In a blender, blend the kiwi, banana, blueberries, strawberries, ice, orange juice, and yogurt until smooth.

title: Orange Banana Smoothie
description: A delightful blend of orange and banana - filling enough to have as a breakfast!
instructions: In a blender, combine milk, oranges, banana, sugar, salt and yogurt. Blend for about 1 minute. Insert ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Simple Cantaloupe Smoothie
description: This cantaloupe smoothie recipe uses vanilla yogurt blended with fresh cantaloupe and orange juice for a creamy and delicious way to start your day.
ingredients: 1 cup vanilla yogurt (such as Dannon® Light and Fit®)
4 ice cubes, crushed, or as needed
instructions: Process yogurt, orange juice, cantaloupe, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Apple Banana Smoothie
description: Thick and healthy fruit drink with apple, banana and orange juice. The frozen banana takes the place of shaved ice and results in a smooth, creamy texture. Serve with dollop of whipped cream for added effect.
ingredients: 1 Gala apple, peeled, cored and chopped
instructions: In a blender combine frozen banana, orange juice, apple and milk. Blend until smooth. pour into glasses and serve.

title: Peach Banana Smoothie
description: Canned peaches, bananas, yogurt, and orange juice deliver a delicious smoothie in mere minutes.
ingredients: 0.25 cup white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Blend yogurt, peaches, bananas, orange juice, sugar, and ice in a blender on high until the ice is crushed and the smoothie is to your desired consistency.

title: Nectarine Sunshine Smoothie
description: Enjoy the brief, sweet season of fresh nectarines with this delicious smoothie.
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into pieces and frozen
instructions: Place the nectarines, frozen banana chunks, orange, vanilla yogurt, orange juice, and honey into a blender, and blend until smooth.

title: Easy Orange Cream Slush
description: This is a simple and delicious recipe for a cool and creamy orange drink.
instructions: Combine the orange juice, milk, sugar, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Vitamix Green Smoothie
description: Use a Vitamix blender to mix up this wholesome green smoothie that's so fruity and delicious, you won't taste the spinach!
ingredients: 15 seedless red grapes, or more to taste
instructions: Pour water into a Vitamix blender. Add grapes, banana, pear, orange, spinach, ground flax seeds, and ice, in that order. Blend until smooth and creamy.

title: Starter Smoothie
description: Customize this base recipe with your favorite fruits and vegetables for a tasty, calorie-conscious smoothie every time!
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into chunks and frozen
instructions: Blend blueberries, grape juice, banana, yogurt, ice, and honey in a blender until smooth, at least 3 minutes.

title: Kale Orange Banana Smoothie
description: A fresh orange, a pair of ripe bananas, and a kale leaf are blended into a pudding-like smoothie for a wholesome breakfast drink.
ingredients: 1 leaf kale, torn into several pieces
instructions: Blend orange in a blender until mostly juice.
Add water and kale; blend again on High speed until kale is liquefied.
Break bananas into chunks and add to the blender. Start blending at a lower speed until banana is incorporated. Increase speed to blend the mixture into a pudding-like texture.

title: Superfood Berry-Green Smoothie
description: Almond milk, spinach greens, berries, seeds, and vanilla protein powder are blended together in this superfood smoothie sure to fill you up.
ingredients: 1 cup spinach, or more to taste
instructions: Place almond milk, clementine, raspberries, spinach, chia seeds, flaxseed meal, blueberries, and protein powder in a blender, respectively. Blend on high until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Triple Threat Fruit Smoothie
description: A wonderful, delightful fruit smoothie...it will help you cool down after a hot day in the sun.
instructions: In a blender, blend the kiwi, banana, blueberries, strawberries, ice, orange juice, and yogurt until smooth.

title: Mongolian Strawberry Orange Juice Smoothie
description: An icy fruit blend of fresh strawberries, orange juice, and ice.
instructions: In a blender, combine strawberries, orange juice, ice cubes, and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Dragon Fruit Shake
description: Dragon fruit (also known as pitaya) is joined by fresh tangerine and basil in this refreshing Vietnamese drink.
instructions: Cut two 1/4 inch thick slices from the peeled dragon fruit to use as a garnish; set aside. Place the remaining dragon fruit into a blender along with the tangerine segments, lime juice, basil, brown sugar, and sparkling water. Puree until smooth. Stir in the crushed ice, and pour into glasses. Garnish with the reserved dragon fruit slices to serve.

title: Sour Smoothie
description: A smoothie made with oranges, lemon, lime, and kiwi with a hint of honey is just the right amount of sweet and sour.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon honey, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice, orange, limes, lemon, kiwi, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Orange-Pear Green Smoothie with Bok Choy
description: With no added sugars, this is the green smoothie you need: a refreshing blend of bok choy, kale, orange, mint, pear, pineapple, and banana.
instructions: Combine pear, grapes, water, pineapple, banana, bok choy, kale, orange, ice, and mint in a large blender. Blend, starting on low speed and increasing to high, until smooth. Turn blender to liquefy setting for a smoother texture.

title: Creamy Orange-Coconut Smoothie
description: A creamy smoothie made with coconut, a fresh orange, and notes of vanilla is a great way to start the day.
ingredients: 1 large navel orange, peeled and cut into chunks
instructions: Combine orange chunks, yogurt, orange juice, almond milk, 2 tablespoons coconut, brown sugar, and vanilla extract in a blender; process until smooth. Add ice cubes and puree until smooth and thick. Divide between 2 glasses and garnish with remaining coconut.

title: Strawberry Sensation Smoothie
description: Strawberry and orange flavors will be sure to perk up your morning!
instructions: Blend the strawberries, orange pieces, apple juice, vanilla yogurt, and almonds together in a blender until smooth.

title: Very Cherry Smoothie
description: Sweet cherries, orange juice and coconut milk make a quick and delicious smoothie.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh or frozen pitted sweet cherries
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and process until smooth.

title: Pawpaw (Papaya) And Mango Punch
description: A refreshing punch made with papaya and mango.
ingredients: 0.25 cup white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Place the mango and papaya into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth; add the orange juice, lime juice, sugar, orange zest, and water. Blend well. Serve over crushed ice.

title: Creamy Orange Glorious
description: This orange smoothie with heavy cream and vanilla, is reminiscent of a popular fast food drink.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
instructions: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, cream, carbonated water, confectioners' sugar, vanilla and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

title: Orange and Coconut Cream Smoothie
description: Perfectly portioned for a snack or on-the-go treat, this creamy coconut, orange, and ginger smoothie is easy to prepare and super delicious to sip.
instructions: Combine coconut cream, orange juice, and ginger in a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Orange Slush
description: A yummy drink concocted of orange juice, milk and ice. Lightly sweetened and flavored with vanilla, it's like being at the mall without the crowds!
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
instructions: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, sugar, vanilla and ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Key Lime Pie Smoothie
description: Key lime pie doesn't just need to be enjoyed in its traditional form; now you can drink it as a smoothie!
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) container Key lime-flavored Greek yogurt
1 tablespoon heavy whipping cream, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice, yogurt, banana, cream, and orange juice together in a blender until smooth.

title: Orange Glorious II
description: This is a slightly sweeter version of the original Orange Glorious.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
instructions: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, water, sugar and vanilla. Add ice cubes and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Orange Snowman
description: This is one drink my kids love! It's orange and slushy and wonderful!
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
instructions: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, water, sugar, vanilla and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Orange Glorious I
description: Milk, o.j., vanilla, sugar, water and ice...make an Orange Glorious combination.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
instructions: In a blender combine milk, water, orange juice concentrate, ice cubes, vanilla and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into three 12 oz glasses and enjoy with a straw.

title: Easy and Tasty Green Smoothie
description: This tasty green smoothie with spinach, fruit, and flaxseed is perfect for breakfast or a midday snack.
ingredients: 1 medium navel orange, peeled and cut into chunks
instructions: Combine water, spinach, orange chunks, banana, and flaxseed in a blender; process until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute.

title: Orange Smoothie
description: A great drink for orange lovers, and a fun way to cool off! Orange juice concentrate is blended with milk and ice to produce a tasty slushy drink!
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
instructions: In a blender, combine orange juice concentrate, milk, water, vanilla, sugar and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Kinaja
description: A smashing fruit smoothie. Kiwi, bananas, pineapple rings, and lots of juice are tossed into the blender with crushed ice. What emerges is four servings of tropical bliss.
instructions: In an electric blender, mix together orange juice, kiwi, bananas, pineapple, and pineapple juice until well blended. Pour the mixture into a pitcher.
Place the ice in the blender, then pour the fruit mixture over the ice. Process until the ice is blended in with the fruit juices.

title: Vanilla Banamango Smoothie
description: Combine a frozen banana, a mango, and a few other ingredients and make a tasty blended smoothie for breakfast or a snack.
ingredients: 0.25 cup orange juice, or to taste
instructions: Pour orange juice into the pitcher of a blender and add mango, frozen banana, carrots, vanilla yogurt, ice cubes, and ginger. Pulse several times to crush ice, then blend until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute.

title: Tropical Delite Smoothie
description: Coconut milk, mango, and orange juice blend together into a quick and tropical-tasting smoothie. Top with whipped cream and a sprinkling of chocolate if you like.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can mango slices with juice
instructions: Place coconut milk, mango slices with their juice, orange juice, and sugar into a blender, and blend until smooth; add the shaved ice, and blend again. Pour into 4 glasses, and top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkling of shaved milk chocolate.

title: Pacific Smoothie
description: A tropical delight that hits a sweet tooth, but reminds you of sunbathing in the tropics.
instructions: Blend the ice, banana, maple syrup, brown sugar, eggnog, orange juice, and vanilla yogurt together in a blender until smooth.

title: P.O.M. Spritzer
description: This blend of pomelo, orange, and mango juice plus club soda makes a lovely non-alcoholic addition to a spring or summer brunch! P.O.M. is an abbreviation for the 3 fruits included.
instructions: Peel pomelo and separate the fruit from the pith. Place fruit segments into a high performance blender (such as a Vitamix®). Blend on variable 1, quickly switching to variable 10. Blend for 1 minute.
Peel mango, remove pit, and cut into slices. Add to the blender and blend for another minute.
Cut oranges in half and squeeze juice into a small container. Strain to remove pulp, if desired, and pour juice into the blender. Add club soda and blend on high speed for 1 minute. Serve chilled.

title: Blueberry Smoothie
description: Blueberry smoothie recipes are a favorite way to enjoy fresh or frozen berries, and this one's a winner! Tangy yogurt and a touch of sugar balance it.
instructions: Blend blueberries, yogurt, milk, sugar, vanilla, and nutmeg in a blender until frothy, scraping down the sides of the blender if needed.
Divide between 2 glasses and serve immediately.

title: Blueberry, Banana, and Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: This is a perfect peanut butter and berry smoothie to start your day or enjoy as a snack. Flax gives a boost to this recipe. It's kid-friendly too!
instructions: Put flaxseed meal into a blender to grind and further break down.
Place banana, milk, blueberries, yogurt, peanut butter, and honey into the blender. Cover and purée until smooth.
Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Healthy Blueberry Breakfast Smoothie
description: Wondering what to eat for your on-the-go breakfast? Make this healthy and delicious blueberry breakfast smoothie.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste
instructions: Blend blueberries, yogurt, orange juice, sugar, vanilla extract, and cinnamon together in a blender on low speed for 30 seconds; increase speed to high and blend until smooth, about 2 minutes. Add ice and blend on high until smooth, about 1 minute more.

title: All-Fruit Smoothies
description: There's nothing in this smoothie except pineapple juice, banana, and frozen strawberries and blueberries. It's smooth, frosty, and dairy-free.
instructions: Pour pineapple juice into a blender and add banana, strawberries, and blueberries. Cover and blend until smooth, about 1 minute. Pour into 2 glasses.

title: Berries and Cream Smoothie
description: Sweet, thick, and a great alternative to dessert, this berries and cream smoothie is blended up in minutes to enjoy on-the-go.
instructions: Pour cream and half-and-half into an electric blender and blend on low speed until it begins to thicken. Add sugar and vanilla extract and mix for about 30 seconds. Add blueberries, strawberries, raspberries, and blackberries. Blend until smooth, adding milk if necessary to make blending easier.

title: Strawberry Blueberry Smoothies
description: Frozen strawberries and blueberries are combined in a yogurt smoothie sweetened with agave nectar.
instructions: Blend almond milk, strawberries, blueberries, yogurt, flax seed oil, and agave nectar in a blender until smooth.

title: Blueberry Smoothie Bowl
description: A blueberry and banana smoothie is topped with coconut and almonds in this quick and easy blueberry smoothie bowl recipe.
instructions: Blend blueberries, 1/2 banana, water, cashew butter, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl.
Top smoothie with sliced banana, almonds, and coconut.

title: Avocado Blueberry Smoothie
description: This five-ingredient smoothie uses only blueberries, avocado, yogurt, almond milk, and water.
instructions: Blend blueberries, yogurt, almond milk, water, and avocado in a blender until smooth.

title: Overnight Oats Blueberry Smoothie Bowl
description: Overnight oats and blueberries are blended and topped with coconut and chia seeds in this colorful smoothie bowl recipe.
ingredients: 1.25 cups unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk, divided
1 teaspoon maple syrup, or to taste
instructions: Combine oats and 2/3 cup almond milk in a bowl; cover and refrigerate until milk is absorbed by oats, 8 hours to overnight.
Combine oats-almond milk mixture, remaining almond milk, banana, blueberries, vanilla, and maple syrup in a blender; blend until smooth.
Pour smoothie into 2 bowls, then top with coconut, blueberries, and chia seeds.

title: Almond Berry Smoothie
description: Almond milk and almond butter are the star ingredients in this berry smoothie with almond milk for a nutritious, on-the-go meal that is vegan and paleo-friendly.
instructions: Combine blueberries, banana, almond milk, and almond butter in a blender; blend until smooth, adding water for a thinner smoothie.

title: Starter Smoothie
description: Customize this base recipe with your favorite fruits and vegetables for a tasty, calorie-conscious smoothie every time!
ingredients: 1 banana, cut into chunks and frozen
instructions: Blend blueberries, grape juice, banana, yogurt, ice, and honey in a blender until smooth, at least 3 minutes.

title: Super Healthy Fruit Smoothie
description: Absolutely wonderful fruit smoothie with raspberries, blueberries, strawberries and more! I have this for breakfast every morning.
instructions: Place the blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, pomegranate and mango juices, milk, and honey into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Tropical Mango-Pineapple-Berry Smoothie
description: A refreshing tropical mango blueberry smoothie with strawberries and pineapple juice, made creamy with vanilla yogurt. Full of flavor and antioxidants!
instructions: Combine mango, frozen strawberries, yogurt, pineapple juice, and frozen blueberries in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Berry Good Smoothie
description: The natural sweetness of three types of berries brings wonderful, fresh flavor to this tasty summer smoothie with water.
instructions: Blend ice cubes in a blender until crushed. Pour in water and juice; blend.
Add frozen raspberries, mixed berries, and blueberries; blend until smooth. Pour into chilled glasses.

title: Very Berry Anti-Inflammatory Smoothie
description: This grape, cherry, strawberry and blueberry smoothie tastes amazing while packing in anti-inflammatory benefits!
instructions: Pour almond milk into a high-frequency blender (such as Vitamix®). Add cherries, strawberries, grapes, blueberries, and turmeric.
Secure lid, and turn onto variable speed 1. Increase speed to variable 10. Blend for 30 to 45 seconds.

title: Heavenly Blueberry Smoothie
description: This blueberry, banana, and flax smoothie is to die for! It tastes so good, you forget that it's good for ya!
ingredients: 1 frozen banana, thawed for 10 to 15 minutes
instructions: Cut banana into small pieces and place into the bowl of a blender. Add the soy milk, yogurt, flax seed meal, and honey. Blend on lowest speed until smooth, about 5 seconds. Gradually add the blueberries while continuing to blend on low. Once the blueberries have been incorporated, increase speed, and blend to desired consistency.

title: Heart Healthy Blueberry Smoothie
description: This delicious blueberry-pomegranate smoothie is perfect for when you're on the go.
ingredients: 0.25 cup granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
instructions: Blend blueberries, pomegranate juice, yogurt, milk, oats, sweetener, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth, about 2 minutes.

title: Triple Threat Fruit Smoothie
description: A wonderful, delightful fruit smoothie...it will help you cool down after a hot day in the sun.
instructions: In a blender, blend the kiwi, banana, blueberries, strawberries, ice, orange juice, and yogurt until smooth.

title: Blueberry Banana Oatmeal Smoothie
description: Make this recipe for a blueberry banana oatmeal smoothie when you need a quick and easy breakfast or snack.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste
instructions: Blend soy milk, banana, blueberries, oats, chia seeds, vanilla extract, and white sugar together in a blender until smooth.

title: Strawberry and Blueberry Oatmeal Health Shake
description: This strawberry and blueberry protein smoothie made with Greek yogurt, milk, and oats is a quick and easy way to fuel up for the day.
ingredients: 0.25 cup vanilla and honey Greek yogurt (such as Chobani®)
instructions: Combine blueberries, milk, strawberries, sugar, oats, and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth. Add ice; blend until smooth.

title: Avocado, Blueberry, Banana, and Chia Smoothie
description: Fresh blueberries are blended with avocado, banana, almond milk, and chia seeds into a quick and easy smoothie with a touch of sweetness.
instructions: Combine almond milk, avocado, blueberries, banana, ice, and chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Easy Acai Smoothie Bowl
description: Try this easy acai smoothie bowl with bananas, blueberries and almond milk. Garnish with berries, nuts, or granola to your liking.
ingredients: 7 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp, partially defrosted in refrigerator overnight
0.75 cup almond milk, or more as needed
2 tablespoons fresh blueberries, or to taste
1 tablespoon pomegranate seeds, or to taste
1 tablespoon large coconut flakes, or to taste
instructions: Combine acai, bananas, blueberries, almond milk, and honey in a blender. Blend until smooth. Smoothie should have a thick consistency, like frozen yogurt.
Pour into 2 bowls and top with banana slices, blueberries, pomegranate seeds, and coconut.

title: Purple Power Punch Smoothie (My Kids' Fave)
description: This kid-pleasing power smoothie made with strawberries, blueberries, blackberries, and raspberries is sure to become your go-to smoothie of choice.
ingredients: 0.5 cup nonfat vanilla yogurt (such as Dannon® Light and Fit®)
