3 tablespoons turbinado sugar (such as Sugar in the Raw®)
instructions: Pulse yogurt, strawberries, water, powdered milk, banana, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries, and protein powder together in a blender until well-mixed. Add ice, sugar, and honey and blend until smooth.

title: Morning Energy Booster Smoothie
description: Prune juice, yogurt, berries, and flax seed are blended together creating an energy-boosting smoothie to start your day off right.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
1 cup frozen blueberries, or to taste
instructions: Pour prune juice into a blender. Layer Greek yogurt, spinach, blueberries, strawberries, peach, and flax seeds in the blender, in this order. Start blender on low speed and gradually increase speed until smoothie is well blended.

title: Blueberry-Watermelon Smoothie
description: Perfect for cooling down on hot summer days, this blueberry-watermelon smoothie blends fruit and spinach together for wholesome flavor.
instructions: Combine watermelon, blueberries, banana, and cucumber in an electric blender and blend well. Add spinach last and blend until smoothie gets creamy, about 30 seconds.

title: Summer Sweet Smoothies
description: Fresh fruit blends with cranberry juice for a quick and sweet summertime smoothie.
instructions: Process the cranberry juice, strawberries, blueberries, watermelon, banana, and figs in a blender until smooth and creamy. Enjoy immediately or keep cool in refrigerator.

title: Purple Monstrosity Fruit Smoothie
description: This is a great smoothie for breakfast - and sometimes dinner! You can substitute the orange juice with any mix of juices or even soy milk! The soy milk adds more of a milk shake quality than the juice does.
ingredients: 2 frozen bananas, skins removed and cut in chunks
instructions: Place bananas, blueberries and juice in a blender, puree. Use honey and/or vanilla to taste. Use more or less liquid depending on the thickness you want for your smoothie.

title: Backyard Berry Bowl
description: A berry smoothie is topped with more berries, banana, and granola in this quick and easy smoothie bowl.
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
instructions: Blend ice, 1/2 cup strawberries, 1 banana, blackberries, and apple juice together in a blender until smooth, adding more ice depending on your desired consistency. Pour smoothie into a bowl.
Top smoothie with remaining strawberries, remaining banana, blueberries, and granola. Drizzle honey over the top.

title: Banana Blueberry Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: Blend up a banana, fresh blueberries, peanut butter, vanilla yogurt into a tasty post-workout protein shake with this quick and easy recipe.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vanilla yogurt, or more to taste
instructions: Combine milk, blueberries, ice cubes, banana, vanilla yogurt, peanut butter, and chocolate protein powder in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Ginger Berry Smoothie
description: This invigorating smoothie made with strawberries, blueberries, and agave gets and extra kick from fresh ginger.
ingredients: 1 cup water, or more as needed
4 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped
instructions: Blend water, blueberries, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and smooth.

title: Blueberry and Spice Smoothie
description: Blueberries, cinnamon, and yogurt are blended together creating this blueberry and spice smoothie perfect for breakfast or a snack.
ingredients: 0.25 cup ice cubes, or as desired
0.5 cup frozen blueberries, or to taste
1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Blend ice in a blender until crumbly; add yogurt, milk, blueberries, and cinnamon. Blend until smooth. Taste smoothie and add desired amount of sugar; blend.

title: Spinach-Berry Smoothie
description: If you're trying to add more spinach to your diet, try this yummy smoothie with blueberries, blackberries, and light sour cream. Feel free to use other berries to your liking.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste
instructions: Add spinach leaves to a blender and finely chop. Add berry juice, blueberries, sour cream, sugar, blackberries, and ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately or refrigerate for later.

title: Gordon's Berry Breakfast Drink
description: This berry drink recipe makes an easy and satisfying breakfast-on-the-go and is equally wonderful served as a part of a sit down breakfast or brunch. Blend frozen blueberries and strawberries with juice, yogurt, and bananas to make this colorful and tasty drink.
instructions: Place the orange juice, pineapple juice, yogurt, blueberries, strawberries, and bananas into a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. The berry drink will be very thick. Serve immediately.

title: Berry Smoothie Bowl
description: A strawberry-pineapple smoothie is topped with blueberries, raspberries, almonds, and granola in this tasty berry smoothie bowl.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons frozen acai berry pulp, or as desired
instructions: Blend strawberries, pineapple, yogurt, coconut water, and acai pulp in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl. Top smoothie with kiwi, banana, blueberries, raspberries, almonds, granola, and chia seeds.

title: Fruit Smoothie II
description: A delicious fruit smoothie made with blueberries, apples, raspberries and grapes.
instructions: In a blender, combine blueberries, apples, raspberries, grapes, sugar and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Rainier Cherry Berry Smoothie
description: Rainier cherries, banana, and blueberries are blended with vanilla yogurt and milk in this quick and easy recipe for a refreshing smoothie.
instructions: Combine banana, blueberries, vanilla yogurt, strawberries, cherries, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth, about 60 seconds.

title: Fruity Non-Dairy Oatmeal Smoothie
description: No dairy is needed in this vegan oatmeal smoothie! Fresh berries, bananas, and almond milk bring natural sweetness to this wholesome treat.
instructions: Combine bananas, almond milk, blueberries, and strawberries in a blender and puree until smooth, adding oats just before you have almost reached your desired texture. Blend until oats are mixed in.

title: Ginger Fruit Smoothie
description: A homemade smoothie packed with apple, grapes, and berries gets an extra kick from fresh ginger that is out of this world.
ingredients: 1 cup water, or more as needed
3 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece peeled fresh ginger, cut into thirds
instructions: Blend water, blueberries, grapes, apple, strawberries, ginger, and agave nectar together in a blender until thick and slushy.

title: Frozen Blueberry Smoothie
description: Enjoy this blueberry smoothie with kiwi and yogurt as a refresher on a hot day.
instructions: Blend blueberries, milk, yogurt, kiwi, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.

title: Protein Smoothie Bowl with Berries, Chocolate Chips, and Granola
description: This quick and easy smoothie bowl features protein powder, strawberries, blueberries, chocolate chips, and granola. A great way to start the day!
instructions: Combine strawberries, milk, 1/3 cup granola, blueberries, protein powder, and vanilla in a blender; blend until smooth.
Layer 1/2 of the chocolate chips on the bottom of a bowl. Pour smoothie over top, then sprinkle with remaining chocolate chips and remaining granola.

title: Blueberry Almond Milk Smoothie
description: This almond milk smoothie with blueberries, banana, oats, and almond butter is a great healthy breakfast.
ingredients: 2 cubes ice, or more to taste
instructions: Combine blueberries, almond milk, banana, ice cubes, oats, almond butter, acai powder, vanilla extract, and maple syrup in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Blueberry-Ginger Breakfast Smoothie
description: Frozen blueberries join milk and oats in this filling, honey-sweetened smoothie with an unexpected, but delightful, bite of ginger.
instructions: Combine milk, frozen blueberries, oats, lemon juice, honey, and ginger in a blender; process until smooth.

title: Blue Grapefruit Smoothie
description: This grapefruit smoothie is a perfectly perky marriage of oats, banana, rice milk, and yogurt with juicy kiwi, blueberries, and grapefruit!
ingredients: 1 grapefruit - peeled, seeds removed, and white pith removed
instructions: Mix grapefruit, rice milk, blueberries, yogurt, oats, banana, kiwi, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.

title: "The Jackson" Detox Smoothie
description: With flaxseed oil, plenty of berries, and acai powder for antioxidants, this refreshing detox smoothie makes for a filling meal substitute.
instructions: Place 1 cup strawberries in a blender; blend on ice crush setting until smooth. Add the remaining 1/2 cup strawberries, soy milk, and blueberries; blend until well combined. Add acai powder, flaxseed oil, and stevia with a spoon. Blend until smooth.

title: Blueberry Muffin Smoothie/Shake
description: Blueberries, milk, lemon extract, and vanilla wafers combine to create this delicious blueberry muffin smoothie - perfect for cooling down on a hot day!
instructions: Blend milk, half-and-half, sugar, lemon extract, and cinnamon in a blender; add blueberries and blend until thick and smooth. Blend vanilla wafers and ice cubes into milk mixture until desired consistency is reached.

title: Detox Smoothie
description: Blueberries, spinach, soy milk, and a Granny Smith apple are blended together to make this breakfast detox smoothie full of green goodness.
instructions: Combine Granny Smith apple, spinach, blueberries, soy milk, and ice cubes in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Ann's Berry Green Smoothie
description: Blueberries, strawberries, and spinach are blended with milk and honey creating a quick and easy, on-the-go strawberry smoothie.
ingredients: 1.5 cups fresh spinach, or to taste
instructions: Place strawberries in a bowl; add warm water.
Blend milk and spinach together in a blender until smooth. Add blueberries, banana, and honey and blend until smooth. Add strawberries-water mixture and lemon juice and blend until smooth.

title: Blue Monster Acai Smoothie
description: A smoothie made with blueberries, acai juice, Greek yogurt, and flaxseeds has a refreshing taste and is good brain food.
ingredients: 3 cubes ice, or more to taste
instructions: Combine blueberries, yogurt, juice, ice, and flax seeds in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Blueberry Vanilla Graham Protein Smoothie
description: Fresh blueberries, graham crackers, and dates are blended together with hemp seeds and coconut milk to create a protein-filled smoothie.
ingredients: 1 cup coconut water, or to taste
instructions: Combine coconut water, banana, blueberries, kale, spinach, dates, almond butter, hemp seed hearts, flax seeds, oats, and protein powder in a blender. Cover and puree until smooth. Top with graham cracker crumbs.

title: Vegan Blueberry Basil Smoothie
description: Use up extra fresh basil in a vegan smoothie like this refreshing drink with frozen blueberries - or any berries of your choice.
ingredients: 7 leaves basil, or more to taste
2 (1 gram) packets stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
instructions: Combine blueberries, water, basil, lime juice, and sweetener in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Marlene's Yogurt Berry Smoothie
description: This satisfying yogurt berry smoothie with flax seeds and soy milk is a great way to start your day.
ingredients: 3 ounces baby carrots, cut into chunks
instructions: Pour soy milk and flax seeds into a blender. Allow flax seeds to soften, 1 to 3 minutes. Turn blender on and add yogurt, strawberries, banana, carrots, and coconut, blending well after each addition. Add blueberries and blend until smooth.

title: Easy Mango Banana Smoothie
description: This fresh mango banana smoothie made with milk and vanilla yogurt makes a quick, easy, and deliciously creamy breakfast or mid-afternoon snack.
instructions: Combine mangos, banana, vanilla yogurt, and milk in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Recharge-Style Strawberry Mango Smoothie
description: If you're in need of a vitamin boost- this recharge cafe copy cat smoothie with strawberry and mango will hit the spot!
ingredients: 0.33 cup orange pineapple apple juice blend (such as Welch’s®)
instructions: Add banana, mango, strawberries, juice, and coconut water to a blender. Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape sides as needed. Pour into a glass; garnish with fresh strawberry.

title: Lela's Protein Mango Smoothie
description: Whip up this high-protein vanilla mango smoothie when you need a quick-and-easy refreshing treat.
ingredients: 0.5 mango, chopped, or more to taste
instructions: Blend mango, yogurt, almond milk, ice, protein powder, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Mangonada
description: Mangonadas are a layered Mexican mango smoothie that are sweet, salty, tart, and fruity. A definite cool-down drink for those hot summer days.
instructions: Place 1 teaspoon chamoy on a plate. Place 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning on another plate. Dip rim of glass first in chamoy, then in chili-lime seasoning. Set aside.
Combine frozen mango, water, and lime juice in a blender; blend until smooth.
Place 1/2 tablespoon chamoy in the bottom of the glass. Add 1/2 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning and 1/2 of the blended mangoes. Repeat layers and top with diced fresh mango.

title: Creamy Mango Smoothie
description: This smoothie recipe combines the flavors of mango and vanilla.
instructions: Blend the milk, yogurt, vanilla extract, mango, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth and creamy.

title: Peanut Butter Mango Smoothie
description: Mango and peanut butter blend together to form this recipe for a kid-pleasing smoothie that adults will enjoy, too!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons peanut butter, or to taste
instructions: Blend yogurt, banana, mango, and peanut butter together in a blender until smooth.

title: Mango Watermelon Smoothie
description: Mango and watermelon are blended together in this light and refreshing smoothie to make this a perfect beverage for a hot summer day.
instructions: Blend watermelon, mango, water, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.
Place ice into glasses and pour smoothie over ice.

title: Mango Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
description: Blend mango, oats, yogurt, orange juice, and banana together to make this recipe for a delicious breakfast smoothie.
instructions: Blend orange juice, mango, banana, yogurt, and oats together in a blender until smooth.

title: Summertime Mango Drink
description: A favorite summer beverage, this mango drink is easy and quick; you can be enjoying this cool drink in the hot sun in just about 5 minutes.
instructions: Combine mangoes, ice cubes, vanilla extract, and sugar in a blender; pour in milk. Blend until liquefied.

title: Mango-Peach Smoothie
description: You can use fresh or frozen fruit in this yummy mango and peach smoothie. It tastes better if the fruit is frozen, so I freeze fresh fruit for this easy treat.
ingredients: 0.5 cup orange juice, or as needed
instructions: Place peach, mango, soy milk, and orange juice into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.

title: Mango Cherry Smoothie
description: This mango and cherry smoothie is a tangy, delicious breakfast drink or snack to cool down on a sunny day.
instructions: Blend cherries, mango, water, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.

title: Chamoyada
description: Chamoyadas are a Mexican traditional drink made with fresh mangos and chamoy sauce. This recipe uses fresh frozen mangoes and pineapple juice for an added tropical twist.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh or frozen mango cubes
instructions: Combine mango and pineapple juice in a blender; blend until smooth. Set aside.

Rub lime wedge around the rim of a glass, then dip in 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning. Juice lime into the glass; add 1 tablespoon chamoy and remaining 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning. Pour 1/2 of the mango-pineapple mixture into the prepared glass. Add remaining 1 tablespoon chamoy sauce and top with remaining mango-pineapple mixture.

title: Tropical Mango-Pineapple-Berry Smoothie
description: A refreshing tropical mango blueberry smoothie with strawberries and pineapple juice, made creamy with vanilla yogurt. Full of flavor and antioxidants!
instructions: Combine mango, frozen strawberries, yogurt, pineapple juice, and frozen blueberries in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Mango Banana Smoothie
description: The orange mango smoothie from that famous coffee shop isn't available any longer, but you can make your own at home with this simple, 4-ingredient recipe.
instructions: Blend banana, mango, juice, and yogurt in a blender until nearly smooth.

title: Restaurant Style Mango Lassi
description: This mango lassi uses canned mangos to create a smoother, tastier drink.
ingredients: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans mango pulp, or mango slices with juice
instructions: Pour mangos, yogurt, milk, and ice into the bowl of a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Mango-Pineapple Smoothie
description: I invented this one day when I had leftover mango and pineapple juice. A spoonful of cream of coconut added the sweetness and special flavor with a tropical flare. You may use frozen pineapple juice ice cubes instead for more of a slush drink (about 8 pineapple ice cubes). Enjoy!
instructions: In a blender, blend the vanilla yogurt, pineapple juice, banana, mango, milk, and cream of coconut until smooth.

title: Licuado de Mango
description: Every town in Mexico has someone selling licuados, fabulously refreshing drinks. Try experimenting with other fruit!
instructions: Place mango, milk, honey, and ice cubes into a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Mango Pina Colada Smoothie
description: This mango pina colada smoothie is my version of the cocktail but without alcohol.
instructions: Purée mango, coconut milk, ice, pineapple juice, cream, and sugar in a blender until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.

title: Pineapple Mango Coconut Smoothie
description: Our Coconut Almond Blend is the perfect tropical base for this pineapple-mango smoothie.
ingredients: 1 cup Almond Breeze Original or Unsweetened Original almondmilk
1 cup fresh or frozen mango cubes
1 cup fresh, frozen, or juice-packed pineapple chunks
1 tablespoon toasted slivered or sliced almonds
instructions: Puree all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

title: Mango Lassi II
description: This creamy, smooth mango lassi is made with yogurt and mango and is absolutely heavenly.
instructions: In a blender, combine mangos, yogurt, sugar and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.

title: My Mango Lassi
description: Mango lassi is very rich and luxurious drink with yogurt and mangoes. It is the perfect summer drink when served chilled.
ingredients: 1.5 cups mangos - peeled, seeded, chopped, and chilled
instructions: Combine mangos, yogurt, milk, cream, confectioners' sugar, and cardamom in a blender; blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

title: Acai Mango Smoothie Bowl
description: Acai, mango, almond milk, oats, and chia seeds make a fantastic smoothie bowl for 2, just in time to start the day with something delicious.
ingredients: 4 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp (such as Sambazon®)
instructions: Place almond milk, mango, bananas, rolled oats, and acai pulp in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into 2 bowls and top with chia seeds and drizzle with maple syrup.

title: Mango-Strawberry Smoothie with Yogurt
description: A quick and easy mango strawberry smoothie made with nonfat vanilla yogurt. Great for an after-workout snack or just to enjoy on a hot day!
instructions: Combine mango, strawberries, and apple juice in a blender. Place ice over the fruit and pour in yogurt. Blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into a glass.

title: Spinach, Avocado, and Mango Smoothie
description: A delicious thick and creamy smoothie with spinach, avocado, and mango. The addition of powdered lemonade mix produces a sweet and tangy drink.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon powdered lemonade mix (such as Country Time®)
1 packet stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
instructions: Combine spinach, mango, avocado, powdered lemonade mix, sugar substitute, and water in a blender; blend until thick and frothy.

title: Pawpaw (Papaya) And Mango Punch
description: A refreshing punch made with papaya and mango.
ingredients: 0.25 cup white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Place the mango and papaya into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth; add the orange juice, lime juice, sugar, orange zest, and water. Blend well. Serve over crushed ice.

title: Watermelon Strawberry Mango Lemonade Smoothie
description: Watermelon, strawberries, and mango are blended a good amount of lemon juice creating a sweet and tasty on-the-go lemonade smoothie.
instructions: Blend watermelon, water, strawberries, mango, sugar, and lemon juice in a blender until smooth, about 5 minutes.

title: Spiced Mango Lassi
description: Mango lassi is the queen of mango drinks; this quick and easy recipe features bright Indian spices, frozen mango, vanilla extract, and honey.
instructions: Combine yogurt, mango chunks, mango juice, honey, vanilla extract, ground cardamom, ground cinnamon, and ground ginger in a blender; process until liquefied.

title: Mango-Mint Lassi with Indian Sweet Spices
description: Mint and mango are joined by star anise and cardamom in this refreshing Indian yogurt drink.
ingredients: 1 large mango - peeled, seeded, and diced
instructions: Blend the mango, brown sugar, chopped mint, star anise, cardamom, lime juice, and yogurt in a blender on high speed until smooth. Pour into glasses and garnish with fresh mint sprigs to serve.

title: Ultimate Fruit Smoothie
description: Milk, orange juice, strawberries, mango, peach, and pineapple combine to make this delightful smoothie that has a little tang with dash of sweet.
ingredients: 0.5 mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
0.5 fresh peach - peeled, pitted, and sliced
instructions: Blend milk, orange juice, mango, peach, pineapple, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

title: Mega Mango Smoothie
description: Healthy meets high energy in a refreshing mango, orange, banana, and cottage cheese smoothie.
instructions: Place the mango, cottage cheese, ice cubes, orange juice, water, banana, honey, flax oil and vanilla in a blender. Blend for 2 minutes or until very smooth; serve immediately.

title: Mango Craze Juice Blend
description: This is a great dairy-free smoothie for the true mango lover!
ingredients: 1.5 cups chopped fresh or frozen peaches
instructions: Place mango, peaches, orange, nectarine, orange juice, and ice into a blender. Blend for 1 minute, or until smooth.

title: Superfood Stevia Smoothie
description: Make your morning super, with this superfood smoothie made with chia seeds and Stevia In The Raw.
ingredients: 2 (1 gram) packets Stevia In The Raw®
instructions: In a blender, combine mango, kale, almond milk, orange juice, stevia, and chia seeds. Blend until smooth.

title: Sesame Mango Smoothie
description: Sesame seeds and cashew butter add a nice nutty flavor to this mango and spinach green smoothie that is a great on-the-go breakfast.
instructions: Layer banana, mango, cucumber, spinach, cashew butter, and sesame seeds in a blender, in the order mentioned; add water. Blend until smoothie is desired consistency, adding more water if desired.

title: Mango Lassi-Come-Home
description: Pureed mango and mango nectar are blended with lemon yogurt, vanilla yogurt, milk, and honey to make a delicious beverage suitable for serving with your favorite curry dish.
instructions: Blend the lemon yogurt, vanilla yogurt, milk, pureed mango, honey, mango nectar, and cardamom together in a blender until completely combined. Serve immediately.

title: Coconut Banango Smoothie
description: Coconut milk, bananas, and mango are blended into a creamy tropical smoothie perfect for on-the-go breakfasts.
instructions: Blend mango, bananas, coconut milk, water, ice, sugar, coconut extract, and lime zest in a blender until smooth.

title: Lemon Coconut Cleanser
description: Fresh lemon, zucchini, spinach, and mango chunks are blended into this quick and easy smooth coconut cleanser with bright citrus flavor.
ingredients: 4 ice cubes, or more to taste
instructions: Combine mango chunks, lemon, spinach, zucchini, water, ice cubes, and coconut oil in a high-speed blender; blend until smooth.

title: Easy Mango Lassi
description: This delicious mango and yogurt shake is great for extinguishing the fire in your mouth after eating hot curries!
ingredients: 4 teaspoons white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Place the yogurt, milk, mangoes, white sugar, and cardamom into the jar of a blender and blend until smooth, about 2 minutes. Chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour or until cold, and serve sprinkled with a little ground cardamom.

title: Basil Strawberry Mango Smoothie
description: A cold, refreshing smoothie with fresh strawberries and frozen mango is given an herbal kick with the inclusion of fresh basil leaves.
ingredients: 0.25 cup white sugar, or to taste
instructions: Blend the basil, mango, strawberries, and water in a blender. Add sugar and ice cubes; blend again until smooth.

title: Mango- Coconut Smoothie
description: The taste of the tropics--coconut and mango--make a quick and refreshing smoothie.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Diced mango and shredded coconut for garnish
instructions: Place the first four ingredients in Osteru® Versau® Performance Blender in order listed
Add 1 cup water.
Select programmed SMOOTHIE setting.
Serve immediately. Top with diced mango and coconut, if desired.

title: Mango Smoothie Bowl
description: This easy mango smoothie bowl with banana and coconut milk is a great start into the day. You can change up the fruit for garnish to your liking.
ingredients: 0.75 cup coconut milk, or to taste
1 teaspoon agave syrup, or to taste
1 tablespoon coconut flakes, or more to taste
6 pieces fresh raspberries, or more to taste
instructions: Combine mango, milk, banana, and agave syrup in a blender; blend until smooth.
Pour into a bowl. Garnish with rows of banana, pomegranate seeds, flaked coconut, and raspberries.

title: BFF Smoothie
description: This creamy strawberry and mango smoothie has a hint of mint added at the end of blending.
ingredients: 5 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
instructions: Blend strawberries, Greek yogurt, mango, milk, and protein powder together until smooth. Add mint leaves and pulse until leaves are chopped, 4 to 5 pulses.

title: Vegan Kale Smoothie
description: Combine kale, mango, pineapple, banana, and almond-coconut milk for a delicious and nutritious vegan green smoothie the whole family (including your kids!) will love.
ingredients: 1 cup almond-coconut milk, or more if needed
instructions: Combine kale, mango, pineapple, 1 cup almond-coconut milk, banana, chia seeds, and flax seed in a high-performance blender (such as Vitamix®); blend until smooth. Add more coconut milk beverage if mixture is too thick.

title: Spiced Mango Protein Smoothie
description: A delicious mango smoothie packed with protein powder and spiced with ginger, turmeric, and nutmeg to boost your immune system.
instructions: Combine soy milk, mango, vanilla protein powder, ginger, turmeric, nutmeg, and ice cubes in a blender cup; blend until smooth.

title: Acai Rainbow Smoothie Bowl for 2
description: Frozen berries and acai pulp, topped with fresh fruits, granola, and agave, make for an amazing and refreshing smoothie bowl for two.
ingredients: 4 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp (such as Sambazon®)
instructions: Place frozen berries, almond milk, banana, and acai pulp in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into 2 bowls and top with granola, mango, strawberries, and kiwi slices. Drizzle with agave syrup.

title: Rainbow Smoothie Packs
description: These smoothie packs blended with Almond Breeze almondmilk will get any day started right.
ingredients: 1.5 cups fresh or frozen sliced strawberries
1 cup fresh or frozen mango cubes
1 cup fresh, frozen, or juice-packed peach slices
1.5 cups fresh, frozen, or juice-packed pineapple chunks
instructions: Place all ingredients except Almond Breeze almondmilk in a small zip-top bag. Freeze until ready to use. To prepare smoothies, place the ingredients and Almond Breeze almondmilk in a blender and puree until smooth.

title: Make-Ahead Tropical Smoothie Packs
description: Make the tropical fruit mix ahead and blend when ready to make these quick and easy smoothies for a refreshing treat.
ingredients: 1 medium firm banana, cut into 1-inch pieces
instructions: Place pineapple, spinach, mango, peaches, banana, cucumber and chia seeds in a large resealable plastic bag or lidded container. Squeeze out the air. Freeze for up to 1 month.
When ready to blend, add contents of bag to blender. Add coconut milk and orange juice and blend on high until mixture is smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Delicious Fruity Green Smoothie
description: This delicious green smoothie has pineapple, mango, banana, blueberries, and greens of your choice and takes just minutes to make.
instructions: Combine kale and water in a blender; process until no chunks remain. Add banana, blueberries, pineapple, and mango; blend until smooth.

title: Fruity Green Matcha Smoothie
description: Blended with mango, spinach, and strawberries, this matcha smoothie makes a healthy, filling breakfast or on-the-go snack.
instructions: Combine milk, yogurt, strawberries, mangos, matcha, honey, and spinach in a blender, in that order. Process until smooth. Make sure you don't over-blend, this can affect the quality of your smoothie!

title: Chef V's Smoothie Bowl
description: Fruit, coconut water, and Greek yogurt are blended together, poured into a bowl, and topped with chia seeds in this smoothie bowl recipe.
instructions: Combine yogurt, coconut water, strawberries, peaches, mango, banana, and 1 tablespoon chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour smoothie into a bowl and top with remaining 1 tablespoon chia seeds.

title: Paleo and Vegan Tropical Acai Bowl for Two
description: Start the day with this quick and easy acai bowl made with pineapple, mango, and chia seeds. Made in just minutes and totally ideal for Paleo and vegan diets.
ingredients: 7 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp (such as Sambazon®)
1 cup iced water, or as needed
instructions: Place mango, pineapple, acai, water, and lime juice in a blender; pulse until smooth and creamy. Pour mixture into 2 bowls; sprinkle with shredded coconut and chia seeds. Drizzle with agave.

title: Green Turmeric Smoothie
description: This green smoothie is full of superfood ingredients like turmeric, spinach, almond butter, hemp hearts, maca, and chia seeds.
instructions: Place coconut milk, spinach, mango, banana, beet, coconut oil, parsley, turmeric, almond butter, maca powder, hemp hearts, chia seeds, bee pollen, cinnamon, ground ginger, salt, and pepper in a high-speed blender (such as Vitamix®). Blend until smooth.

title: Vanilla Banamango Smoothie
description: Combine a frozen banana, a mango, and a few other ingredients and make a tasty blended smoothie for breakfast or a snack.
ingredients: 0.25 cup orange juice, or to taste
instructions: Pour orange juice into the pitcher of a blender and add mango, frozen banana, carrots, vanilla yogurt, ice cubes, and ginger. Pulse several times to crush ice, then blend until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute.

title: P.O.M. Spritzer
description: This blend of pomelo, orange, and mango juice plus club soda makes a lovely non-alcoholic addition to a spring or summer brunch! P.O.M. is an abbreviation for the 3 fruits included.
instructions: Peel pomelo and separate the fruit from the pith. Place fruit segments into a high performance blender (such as a Vitamix®). Blend on variable 1, quickly switching to variable 10. Blend for 1 minute.
Peel mango, remove pit, and cut into slices. Add to the blender and blend for another minute.
Cut oranges in half and squeeze juice into a small container. Strain to remove pulp, if desired, and pour juice into the blender. Add club soda and blend on high speed for 1 minute. Serve chilled.

title: Spinach and Banana Power Smoothie
description: This vegan banana spinach smoothie provides a dairy-free and protein-rich pick-me-up that tastes delicious. It's easy to blend and take anywhere.
instructions: Blend soy milk and spinach together in a blender until smooth. Add banana and pulse until thoroughly blended.

title: Spinach and Kale Smoothie
description: This vibrant spinach and kale smoothie gives you an extra boost of energy thanks to the addition of peanut butter, banana, and chia seeds.
instructions: Combine spinach, almond milk, kale, peanut butter, and chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth. Add banana and blend until smooth.

title: Healthy Berry and Spinach Smoothie
description: This spinach berry smoothie recipe gives kids and adults a hearty helping of vegetables and fruit. It's healthy, delicious, and easy to make.
ingredients: 0.25 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
instructions: Blend berries, yogurt, orange juice, spinach, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

title: Kale and Banana Smoothie
description: This kale smoothie with banana is perfect to help get your daily fruits and veggies. Nutrient-rich kale is mixed in with this tasty, easy smoothie.
instructions: Place kale, banana, soy milk, flax seeds, and maple syrup into a blender. Cover and purée until smooth. Serve over ice.

title: Banana, Avocado, and Spinach Smoothie
description: This banana, avocado, and spinach smoothie recipe makes a quick and easy breakfast or snack that is perfect for a healthy, delicious meal on-the-go.
instructions: Blend banana, avocado, spinach, milk, ice cubes, honey, and vanilla together in a blender until smooth.

title: Green Monster Smoothie
description: Banana, spinach, and peanut butter blend with yogurt and milk for a power-packed smoothie.
instructions: Blend milk, yogurt, banana, peanut butter, spinach, and ice cubes until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Spice Protein Drink
description: This quick and easy pumpkin spice protein drink will fill you up and is perfect for when you're on-the-go.
instructions: Blend almond milk, bananas, pumpkin, dates, protein powder, vanilla extract, nutmeg, cinnamon, cloves, and ginger together in a blender until smooth.

title: Green Power Oat Smoothie
description: This nourishing smoothie is packed with spinach, parsley, green apple, oats, coconut milk, and honey. A great way to start your day!
ingredients: 0.25 cup Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
1 cup baby spinach leaves, tightly packed
0.5 cup cored and chopped green apple
instructions: Place oats, coconut milk, spinach, parsley, apple, honey, lemon juice, and ice in a blender and blend until smooth.

title: Watermelon Refreshing Green Smoothie
description: Start your day with this watermelon spinach smoothie, a perfect combination of fruits and vegetables, ideal for a quick breakfast or snack!
ingredients: 0.5 apple - peeled, cored, and diced, or more to taste
instructions: Place watermelon in a blender; mix until liquefied. Add spinach, broccoli, cucumber, apple, and celery; blend until smooth.

title: Sweet Potato and Banana Smoothie
description: Sweet potato and banana are blended together with soy milk and cinnamon for a creamy and colorful sweet potato smoothie.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake sweet potato in the preheated oven until tender and cooked through, about 1 hour. Remove skin, then cool in the refrigerator 8 hours to overnight.
Blend sweet potato, banana, soy milk, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Smoothie
description: Frozen pumpkin purée, milk, brown sugar, and cinnamon are all you need to make this fall-ready pumpkin smoothie.
instructions: Place frozen pumpkin purée into a microwave-safe bowl. Heat in the microwave on high to soften, 1 to 2 minutes.
Pour milk into a blender. Add softened pumpkin purée, brown sugar, and cinnamon; blend until smooth.

title: Vitamix Green Smoothie
description: Use a Vitamix blender to mix up this wholesome green smoothie that's so fruity and delicious, you won't taste the spinach!
ingredients: 15 seedless red grapes, or more to taste
instructions: Pour water into a Vitamix blender. Add grapes, banana, pear, orange, spinach, ground flax seeds, and ice, in that order. Blend until smooth and creamy.

title: Green Power Mojito Smoothie
description: Spinach, pineapple, banana, and fresh mint leaves are blended to create this delicious, bright green smoothie with a taste similar to a mojito!
ingredients: 3 cups ice cubes, or as desired
2 cups baby spinach leaves, or to taste
10 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice, spinach, pineapple, water, banana, orange, mint, lemon juice, and lime juice in a blender until smooth.

title: Kale, Banana, and Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: Kale in smoothies is all the rage. Try this kale peanut butter smoothie made with peanut butter and bananas in vanilla-flavored almond milk.
ingredients: 0.5 bunch kale - stems removed and discarded, leaves torn into bite-size pieces
4 cubes ice, or more if desired
instructions: Blend bananas, almond milk, kale, ice, and peanut butter in a blender until smooth.

title: Kale Orange Banana Smoothie
description: A fresh orange, a pair of ripe bananas, and a kale leaf are blended into a pudding-like smoothie for a wholesome breakfast drink.
ingredients: 1 leaf kale, torn into several pieces
instructions: Blend orange in a blender until mostly juice.
Add water and kale; blend again on High speed until kale is liquefied.
Break bananas into chunks and add to the blender. Start blending at a lower speed until banana is incorporated. Increase speed to blend the mixture into a pudding-like texture.

title: Superfood Berry-Green Smoothie
description: Almond milk, spinach greens, berries, seeds, and vanilla protein powder are blended together in this superfood smoothie sure to fill you up.
ingredients: 1 cup spinach, or more to taste
instructions: Place almond milk, clementine, raspberries, spinach, chia seeds, flaxseed meal, blueberries, and protein powder in a blender, respectively. Blend on high until smooth, about 30 seconds.

title: Green Detox Smoothie
description: Start your day off right with this recipe for a quick and easy green smoothie featuring spinach, avocado, apple, broccoli, and pineapple juice.
instructions: Blend pineapple juice, spinach, pear, apple, avocado, and broccoli florets together in a blender until smooth.

title: Tropical Smoothie with Kale
description: Kale provides a nice green color to this tropical smoothie made with pineapple and banana for a quick-and-easy breakfast made with a NutriBullet or blender.
ingredients: 1 cup almond milk, or as needed
instructions: Place pineapple, kale, and banana in a blender; add almond milk. Blend until smooth.

title: Kale and Berries Breakfast Smoothie
description: This green kale and berry smoothie with almonds is an easy way to get a couple of servings of fruit and vegetables at breakfast time!
instructions: Combine banana, berries, kale, orange juice, water, almonds, and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth, about 20 to 30 seconds.

title: Agua Fresca de Pina y Espinacas (Pineapple Spinach Agua Fresca)
description: This aqua fresca with spinach and pineapple is refreshing, delicious, and healthy! Since fresh pineapple is very sweet on its own, the sweetener is not necessarily needed.
ingredients: 4 packets stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
instructions: Combine pineapple, spinach, and sweetener in a blender. Add 2 cups water and blend until smooth.
Pour into a pitcher and add the remaining 4 cups water.

title: Keto Avocado-Spinach Smoothie
description: Here's the best keto smoothie on the internet: a no-fail, super-green blend of avocado and spinach, boosted with MCT oil, coconut milk, and vanilla powder.
ingredients: 0.5 cup water, or more as needed
0.5 medium avocado, pitted and scooped from shell
instructions: Combine coconut milk, water, ice cubes, avocado, spinach, erythritol, MCT oil, and vanilla powder in a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Quick Kale and Banana Smoothie
description: Coconut milk, banana, and strawberries sweeten this deceptively delicious kale and banana smoothie.
ingredients: 0.5 cup frozen strawberries, or more to taste
instructions: Blend kale, banana, coconut milk, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

title: Supreme Green Smoothie
description: This super green smoothie gets its sweetness from fresh fruit and a hint of honey from the almondmilk.
ingredients: 2 cups Almond Breeze Hint of Honey almondmilk
1 large kiwi fruit, peeled and chopped
instructions: Place all ingredients in large blender container in order given. Cover; blend on high 15 to 20 seconds or until completely smooth. Pour into glasses.

title: Pumpkin Banana Smoothie
description: This pumpkin banana smoothie has a hint of cinnamon and brown sugar for a delicious on-the-go breakfast in the fall.
instructions: Spoon pumpkin puree into a resealable bag and freeze, 8 hours to overnight.
Remove pumpkin from freezer and allow to soften at room temperature, 5 to 10 minutes.
Pour milk into the blender; add pumpkin, banana, brown sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth, about 3 minutes.

title: Carrot-Banana Smoothie
description: Carrots, banana, red bell pepper, and cucumbers are blended with grapefruit juice in this refreshing, on-the-go smoothie ready in 15 minutes.
instructions: Combine banana, cucumbers, red bell pepper, grapefruit juice, and carrots in a blender; blend until smooth.
Fill a glass with ice and pour smoothie over ice.

title: Sweet Beet Smoothie
description: This refreshing smoothie with banana, pineapple, and avocado is a beautiful color thanks to the addition of raw beets.
instructions: Juice beets and green apples, including peels, in an electric juicer.
Combine apple-beet juice, avocado, pineapple, banana, and ice in a high-speed blender; blend until smooth.

title: Orange-Pear Green Smoothie with Bok Choy
description: With no added sugars, this is the green smoothie you need: a refreshing blend of bok choy, kale, orange, mint, pear, pineapple, and banana.
instructions: Combine pear, grapes, water, pineapple, banana, bok choy, kale, orange, ice, and mint in a large blender. Blend, starting on low speed and increasing to high, until smooth. Turn blender to liquefy setting for a smoother texture.

title: Blueberry-Watermelon Smoothie
description: Perfect for cooling down on hot summer days, this blueberry-watermelon smoothie blends fruit and spinach together for wholesome flavor.
instructions: Combine watermelon, blueberries, banana, and cucumber in an electric blender and blend well. Add spinach last and blend until smoothie gets creamy, about 30 seconds.

title: Skinny Vegan Green Smoothie
description: This skinny vegan green smoothie is the perfect start in the day with unsweetened almond milk, strawberries, banana, and 2 cups of fresh spinach!
instructions: Combine spinach, strawberries, banana, almond milk, and agave in a blender; blend until smooth.

title: Protein Packed Spinach Smoothie
description: Spinach pairs with pineapple, peaches, mango, strawberries, coconut, and a little tofu to create this tropically delicious protein-packed smoothie.
ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened apple juice, or to taste
instructions: Place spinach, bananas, tofu, coconut, peaches, pineapple, mango, and strawberries, respectively, in a blender; pour in apple juice. Blend until desired consistency is reached, adding more apple juice as necessary.

title: Spinach, Avocado, and Mango Smoothie
description: A delicious thick and creamy smoothie with spinach, avocado, and mango. The addition of powdered lemonade mix produces a sweet and tangy drink.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon powdered lemonade mix (such as Country Time®)
1 packet stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
instructions: Combine spinach, mango, avocado, powdered lemonade mix, sugar substitute, and water in a blender; blend until thick and frothy.

title: Yam Smoothie
description: This smoothie is a favorite in my family and is quick and easy to make. You could also use a large can of yams in place of cooking the fresh ones.
instructions: Prick yams with a fork, and place on a plate. Cook in the microwave for 8 to 10 minutes, turning once, until tender. Cool, peel and dice.
Combine the yams, yogurt, milk, ice cubes, sugar and banana in the container of a blender. Blend until smooth.

title: Grapefruit Smoothie
description: This grapefruit smoothie made with spinach and ginger is a refreshing and energizing way to start the day.
instructions: Blend grapefruit, water, spinach, ice cubes, ginger, and flax seeds in a blender or NutriBullet® until smooth.

title: Lean and Green
description: Spinach, fruit, milk, and honey are blended together in this lean and green smoothie for a great start to the day or between meals.
instructions: Blend spinach, banana, apple, strawberries, mango, milk, protein powder, and honey together in a blender until smooth.

title: Cool Kale Smoothie
description: Fresh kale and green grapes are blended into a refreshing green smoothie perfect for on-the-go.
instructions: Blend grapes, kale, and ice together in a blender until smooth.

title: Green Banana and Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: A peanut butter and banana smoothie gets a hint of green thanks to spinach added to the mix. Blend into a rich and creamy breakfast or afternoon treat.
ingredients: 0.125 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or more to taste
1 cup rice milk, or as needed
instructions: Blend oats and almonds in a blender until powdery; add spinach, banana, yogurt, peanut butter, and cinnamon. Blend, gradually adding rice milk, until desired consistency is reached.

title: Caribbean Health Drink
description: Freshly-blended carrot, banana, kiwi, apple, and pineapple make this delicious beverage.
instructions: Blend the carrot, banana, kiwi, apple, pineapple, and ice cubes in a blender until smooth.

title: Island Greens Smoothie
description: This quick green smoothie provides what you need for a fruity, veggie snack--with spinach, banana, pineapple, and almondmilk.
ingredients: 0.75 cup Almond Breeze Original or Unsweetened Original almondmilk
instructions: Place all ingredients into blender and blend on high until smooth.

title: Green Protein Smoothie
description: This minty green smoothie is packed with protein from vanilla protein powder, spinach, soy milk, and almonds.
ingredients: 5 cubes ice, or more to taste
instructions: Combine soy milk, spinach, protein powder, mint leaves, almonds, and ice in a blender cup; blend until smooth.

title: Don't Knock it Until You Try it Zucchini Chocolate Banana Nut Milkshake
description: If you've been looking for a way to work zucchini into a smoothie, here is a recipe for you!
ingredients: 2 large ripe bananas, peeled and frozen
instructions: Blend the zucchini, bananas, cocoa powder, peanuts, sugar, and half and half in a food processor until smooth, thick, and creamy.

title: Green Smoothie Bowl
description: A green smoothie is topped with berries, chia seeds, granola, and coconut in this colorful and hearty green smoothie bowl.
instructions: Blend spinach, banana, coconut milk, mango, and coconut water in a blender until smooth. Pour smoothie into a bowl and top with raspberries, blueberries, granola, coconut flakes, almonds, and chia seeds.

title: Spinach-Berry Smoothie
description: If you're trying to add more spinach to your diet, try this yummy smoothie with blueberries, blackberries, and light sour cream. Feel free to use other berries to your liking.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste
instructions: Add spinach leaves to a blender and finely chop. Add berry juice, blueberries, sour cream, sugar, blackberries, and ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately or refrigerate for later.

title: Superfood Stevia Smoothie
description: Make your morning super, with this superfood smoothie made with chia seeds and Stevia In The Raw.
ingredients: 2 (1 gram) packets Stevia In The Raw®
instructions: In a blender, combine mango, kale, almond milk, orange juice, stevia, and chia seeds. Blend until smooth.

title: Secret Ingredient Smoothie
description: Romaine lettuce, milk, strawberries, and banana all blend together in this unique quick and easy smoothie.
ingredients: 0.33333334326744 cup milk, or more as needed
4 frozen strawberries, or more to taste
0.25 teaspoon vanilla extract, or to taste
instructions: Put romaine lettuce into the bottom of a blender pitcher; add enough milk to cover completely and blend on High until smooth.

Drop one strawberry at a time into the blender while still running on High and allow the berry to blend completely before adding the next. Blend one banana chunk at a time into the mixture in the same manner as the strawberries. Thin the smoothie with additional milk to keep smoothie blending properly. Blend vanilla extract into the smoothie.

title: Sesame Mango Smoothie
description: Sesame seeds and cashew butter add a nice nutty flavor to this mango and spinach green smoothie that is a great on-the-go breakfast.
instructions: Layer banana, mango, cucumber, spinach, cashew butter, and sesame seeds in a blender, in the order mentioned; add water. Blend until smoothie is desired consistency, adding more water if desired.

title: Dairy-Free Pumpkin Spice Smoothie
description: Pumpkin puree, banana, and almond milk with a touch of spice make an easy and delicious, dairy-free breakfast smoothie.
ingredients: 0.75 cup almond milk, or more as needed
instructions: Place almond milk, pumpkin puree, banana, protein powder, and pumpkin pie spice in a blender. Blend until smooth, 15 to 30 seconds. If mixture is too thick, add more almond milk or water to achieve desired consistency.

title: Healthy Fruit and Vegetable Smoothie
description: This fruit and vegetable smoothie, made with berries, banana, kale, and spinach, is a great way to start your day or drink post-workout.
instructions: Combine milk, yogurt, strawberries, banana, blueberries, green ice cube, whey, and honey in a blender, in the order listed. Blend until smooth.

title: Cucumber-Honeydew Smoothie
description: Cucumber and honeydew melon combine with passion fruit juice and fresh mint in a creative smoothie that's guaranteed refreshing on a sultry summer day.
ingredients: 8 sprigs fresh mint, or amount to taste
instructions: Combine cucumber, honeydew melon, passion fruit juice, and ice in a blender. Pull leaves from mint springs and add to blender. Blend mixture until smooth. Pour into tall glasses.

title: Lean Green Smoothie
description: Honeydew melon, grapes, cucumber, and maybe a few pieces of broccoli make up this green, and slightly minty, summer drink.
ingredients: 3 cups honeydew melon - peeled, seeded and cubed
instructions: Place the honeydew melon, ice cubes, grapes, cucumber, broccoli, and mint into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth.

title: Lemon Coconut Cleanser
description: Fresh lemon, zucchini, spinach, and mango chunks are blended into this quick and easy smooth coconut cleanser with bright citrus flavor.
ingredients: 4 ice cubes, or more to taste
instructions: Combine mango chunks, lemon, spinach, zucchini, water, ice cubes, and coconut oil in a high-speed blender; blend until smooth.

title: Green Slime Smoothie
description: This is yummy. With a name like this, your kids will love it.
instructions: Place the spinach in the freezer until frozen, at least 1 hour.
Combine the spinach, strawberries, banana, honey, and ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Virgin Mary Smoothies
description: Perfect for starting your weekend off right, this smoothie is a virgin version of your favorite Bloody Mary Cocktail.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon prepared horseradish, or more to taste
instructions: Blend tomatoes, celery, carrot, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, and hot sauce in a blender until very smooth. Add ice cubes and blend until smooth.

title: Pumpkin Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: Banana, peanut butter, yogurt, and strawberries are blended together in this pumpkin smoothie for a taste of autumn to start your day.
ingredients: 3 whole frozen strawberries, or more to taste
0.25 cup whipped cream, or more to taste
instructions: Blend banana, strawberries, milk, yogurt, pumpkin puree, peanut butter, brown sugar, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, and nutmeg in a blender until smooth; add ice cubes and again blend until smooth. Pour smoothie into 4 glasses and top with whipped cream and a pinch of cinnamon.

title: Beet-Red Raspberry Smoothie
description: This brightly colored smoothie with raspberries, grapes, carrots, and beets is a meal in itself--and it's ready to serve in just minutes.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) container lemon non-fat Greek yogurt
instructions: Place all ingredients in Oster® Versa® Performance Blender in order listed.
Select programmed SMOOTHIE setting.
Serve immediately.

title: Pumpkin Apple Pie Smoothie
description: Experience the warm flavors of fall any time of the year with this pumpkin-apple pie smoothie. Top with crushed graham crackers, pecans, granola, or whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: 1.5 teaspoons brown sugar, or to taste
instructions: Place apple in a plastic microwave-safe bowl; pour in enough water to cover 1/4-inch of the bottom of bowl. Partially cover bowl with a lid or paper towel. Microwave in 1 minute intervals until apple is softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Freeze apple in the same container with water until solid, 2 hours to overnight.
Blend frozen apple, almond milk, and pumpkin puree in a blender until smooth; add brown sugar and pumpkin pie spice. Blend until smooth. Add ice and blend until smooth.

title: The Best Green Smoothie
description: If you're looking for an easy, wholesome green smoothie packed with plant-based ingredients, look no further!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh blueberries, or to taste
instructions: Place apple, spinach, and chia seeds into a blender. Add almond milk and cinnamon and blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and top with blueberries.

title: Green Monster - Spinach Smoothie
description: This banana and spinach smoothie is extra creamy thanks to yogurt added to the mix for a quick and easy, on-the-go breakfast.
instructions: Layer yogurt, banana, and blueberries in a blender, respectively. Add as much spinach to blender that will fit; pour in water. Blend on high speed until smooth, adding the remaining spinach if needed. Add ice for a colder and thicker smoothie. Add more water for a thinner smoothie.

title: Pumpkin Shake
description: Use canned pumpkin puree, frozen banana, and Greek-style yogurt to make this quick breakfast smoothie.
ingredients: 4 cubes ice, or more if desired
instructions: Blend ice, milk, pumpkin puree, yogurt, banana, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, allspice, and vanilla in a blender until smooth.

title: Green Smoothie with Ginger
description: This yummy green smoothie with apple and pear gets a little tang from lemon juice and a spicy aroma from fresh ginger.
ingredients: 2 cups fresh spinach leaves, or to taste
instructions: Combine spinach, 1 cup water, apple, pear, lemon juice, flaxseed, and ginger in a blender. Puree until smooth, adding more water if needed.

title: Easy Pumpkin Pie Smoothie
description: All the goodness of a pumpkin pie is blended into a smoothie and topped with crushed cinnamon graham cracker crumbs.
ingredients: 1 cinnamon graham cracker, crushed and divided
instructions: Blend almond milk, pumpkin, ice cubes, banana, brown sugar, 1/2 the crushed cinnamon graham cracker, wheat germ, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth. Garnish individual servings with remaining graham cracker crumbs.

title: Pineapple Carrot Smoothie
description: A pineapple and carrot smoothie with hemp seeds, ginger, and coconut milk is a hearty and spicy way to start your day.
instructions: Place banana, pineapple, carrot, hemp seeds, ginger, orange zest, cinnamon, coconut milk, and water in a blender in the order listed; blend on high until creamy and smooth.

title: Vegan Kale Smoothie
description: Combine kale, mango, pineapple, banana, and almond-coconut milk for a delicious and nutritious vegan green smoothie the whole family (including your kids!) will love.
ingredients: 1 cup almond-coconut milk, or more if needed
instructions: Combine kale, mango, pineapple, 1 cup almond-coconut milk, banana, chia seeds, and flax seed in a high-performance blender (such as Vitamix®); blend until smooth. Add more coconut milk beverage if mixture is too thick.

title: Spinach and Banana Power Smoothie
description: This vegan banana spinach smoothie provides a dairy-free and protein-rich pick-me-up that tastes delicious. It's easy to blend and take anywhere.
instructions: Blend soy milk and spinach together in a blender until smooth. Add banana and pulse until thoroughly blended.

title: Spinach and Kale Smoothie
description: This vibrant spinach and kale smoothie gives you an extra boost of energy thanks to the addition of peanut butter, banana, and chia seeds.
instructions: Combine spinach, almond milk, kale, peanut butter, and chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth. Add banana and blend until smooth.

title: Healthy Berry and Spinach Smoothie
description: This spinach berry smoothie recipe gives kids and adults a hearty helping of vegetables and fruit. It's healthy, delicious, and easy to make.
ingredients: 0.25 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
instructions: Blend berries, yogurt, orange juice, spinach, and strawberries together in a blender until smooth.

title: Kale and Banana Smoothie
description: This kale smoothie with banana is perfect to help get your daily fruits and veggies. Nutrient-rich kale is mixed in with this tasty, easy smoothie.
instructions: Place kale, banana, soy milk, flax seeds, and maple syrup into a blender. Cover and purée until smooth. Serve over ice.

title: Banana, Avocado, and Spinach Smoothie
description: This banana, avocado, and spinach smoothie recipe makes a quick and easy breakfast or snack that is perfect for a healthy, delicious meal on-the-go.
instructions: Blend banana, avocado, spinach, milk, ice cubes, honey, and vanilla together in a blender until smooth.

title: Green Monster Smoothie
description: Banana, spinach, and peanut butter blend with yogurt and milk for a power-packed smoothie.
instructions: Blend milk, yogurt, banana, peanut butter, spinach, and ice cubes until smooth.

title: Green Power Oat Smoothie
description: This nourishing smoothie is packed with spinach, parsley, green apple, oats, coconut milk, and honey. A great way to start your day!
ingredients: 0.25 cup Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
1 cup baby spinach leaves, tightly packed
0.5 cup cored and chopped green apple
instructions: Place oats, coconut milk, spinach, parsley, apple, honey, lemon juice, and ice in a blender and blend until smooth.

title: Watermelon Refreshing Green Smoothie
description: Start your day with this watermelon spinach smoothie, a perfect combination of fruits and vegetables, ideal for a quick breakfast or snack!
ingredients: 0.5 apple - peeled, cored, and diced, or more to taste
instructions: Place watermelon in a blender; mix until liquefied. Add spinach, broccoli, cucumber, apple, and celery; blend until smooth.

title: Vitamix Green Smoothie
description: Use a Vitamix blender to mix up this wholesome green smoothie that's so fruity and delicious, you won't taste the spinach!
ingredients: 15 seedless red grapes, or more to taste
instructions: Pour water into a Vitamix blender. Add grapes, banana, pear, orange, spinach, ground flax seeds, and ice, in that order. Blend until smooth and creamy.

title: Green Power Mojito Smoothie
description: Spinach, pineapple, banana, and fresh mint leaves are blended to create this delicious, bright green smoothie with a taste similar to a mojito!
ingredients: 3 cups ice cubes, or as desired
2 cups baby spinach leaves, or to taste
10 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
instructions: Blend ice, spinach, pineapple, water, banana, orange, mint, lemon juice, and lime juice in a blender until smooth.

title: Kale, Banana, and Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: Kale in smoothies is all the rage. Try this kale peanut butter smoothie made with peanut butter and bananas in vanilla-flavored almond milk.
ingredients: 0.5 bunch kale - stems removed and discarded, leaves torn into bite-size pieces
4 cubes ice, or more if desired
instructions: Blend bananas, almond milk, kale, ice, and peanut butter in a blender until smooth.

title: Kale Orange Banana Smoothie
description: A fresh orange, a pair of ripe bananas, and a kale leaf are blended into a pudding-like smoothie for a wholesome breakfast drink.
ingredients: 1 leaf kale, torn into several pieces
instructions: Blend orange in a blender until mostly juice.
Add water and kale; blend again on High speed until kale is liquefied.
Break bananas into chunks and add to the blender. Start blending at a lower speed until banana is incorporated. Increase speed to blend the mixture into a pudding-like texture.

title: Superfood Berry-Green Smoothie
description: Almond milk, spinach greens, berries, seeds, and vanilla protein powder are blended together in this superfood smoothie sure to fill you up.
ingredients: 1 cup spinach, or more to taste
